radio aur tv jo maand parhte sitaron ki kafalat he nahi bal ke ubharte hue artists ke hausla afzaai ki riwayaat bhi rakhte hain
lekin dosri taraf village dehaat qasbon buses wagons aur chae khano mein attaullah esakhelvi ki awaaz ka tota bol raha tha

taweel musafat ke liye buses ka ticket lene wale pehle yeh istafsaar bhi karte ke attaullah esakhelvi ki cassette lagaoge mianwali ke logon ne inhe bataya ke tumhare naam se esakhel mein hotel khul gae hain
jagah jagah tumhari taswirein lagi hain aur mianwali mein sirf tumhari cassette he farokht hoti hai to attaullah esakhelvi ne phir esakhel jane ka qasd kiya
phir yeh hua ke radio pakistan ke farmaishi naghmon ke programs mein log attaullah esakhelvi ke songs ki farmaiysh karte

radio hukkam par bhi is hawale se dabao dala jata ke wo apni nashriyat mein attaullah esakhelvi ko madaoo karen aur aakhirkar majboor ho kar attaullah esakhelvi se radio pakistan aane ki darkhuwast karni parhi

tahum radio par songs ka muaawza inhe rupey ka cheque mila jo inho ne cash nahi karwaya aur aaj tak sambhal kar rakha hua hai
sirf yehi nahi bal ke radio par recording se qabal inhe audition awaaz ki qaulity ka imtehaan kea mal se bhi guzarna parha

bushra ansari received many more different prizes and awards in her life
she received an award of pride of performance and women life achievement award from benazir bhutto
she won the ptv award and lux style award also

inka har andaaz munfarid aur har roop judagana hai
sanjeeda acting comedy parody singing hosting aur ab drama nigari
inho ne har field mein apna loha manwaya hai
jis se in ki do betiyan hain
intehai masroof aur mashoor fankara hone ke bawajood inho ne aik biwi aur maa ka role pori zimmedari se adaa kiya
bushra apni family se bohat ziyada attached hain aur fursat ka tamam waqt ghar walon ke sath he guzarti hain
career bushra ansari sirf saal ki umer mein he ptv ke children music show kalbon ki mala ki regular performer ban gai thin
to farooq qiaser ne inhe apne show kalliyan ke liye muntakhib kiya
is ke ilawa wo show ke deegar roles ke liye bhi songs gaya karti thin
bunyadi taur par yeh bahon ka show tha lekin ise har umar ke nazreen barhe shauq se dekha karte the
bushra ne sab se pehle iqbal ansari ke aik drama mein acting ke johar dikhaey
lekin bushra ko sab se ziyada shohrat anwar maqsood ke show shosha se mili
jis mein bushra ne bijli ka role adaa kar ke meyla loot liya
yeh character itna popular hua ke jab kabhi bushra ansari kisi show ke silsile mein beyron e mulk jati to in se bijli ka character karne ki farmaiysh ki jati
bushra ansari ka aik aur aeham show aangan terha hai jise anwar maqsood ne likha aur us mein inho ne shakeel siddiqui aur saleem nasir marhoom ke hamrah yadgar performance di
comedy shows ki bat ho to sab se pehle ptv ki tareekh ke maqbool tareen show fifty fifty ka naam zehan mein aata hai

is show ko maqboliyat ki bulandiyon tak pohnchane mein jahan ismail tara aur majid jahangir ki lajawab performance ka dakhal tha to bushra ansari ne bhi apni parodies ke zariye is show ko kamiyab banane mein koi kasar na chori

personality bushra ansari ko sirf acting mein he malka hasil nahi bal key eh aik shandar shakhsiyat ki bhi malik hain
yeh guzishta saal se mini screen par apni salahiyaton ke johar dikha rahi hain aur din ba din in ke har sitaron ki tadad mein izafa hota ja raha hai
kyun ke wo janti hain ke waqt ke sath sath apne kaam mein kya tabdeeli lai ja sakti hai

reham khan ka sab se maussir hathiyar in ki mega watt taqat wali dilnasheen muskurahat hai jo us waqt bhi in ke labon par machal rahi thi jab inho ne apni zindagi imran khan se shadi kaam aur apne bachon ke barey mein hamare sath halki phulki guftugo ki shuruwat ki
nahi kabhi nahi
wo aise aadmi nahi ke aap ko kuch karne par majboor karen
imran main aap se is liye shadi kar rahi hon ke log nahi jante ke aap kitne ache insaan hain mera khayal hai ke logon ko andaza he nahi ke wok is tarah ke insaan hain
wo chalak hain na makkar bilkul waise he hain ke jaise dikhai dete hain
wo logon ke sath khilwar nahi karte
main bhi in ke barey mein yehi tassur rakhti thi ke wo jarihana mizaaj rakhte hain aur ghusiley bhi hain magar yeh haqiqat nahi
wo muaaf kar dene wale shakhs hain agar koi shakhs bilkhusoos koi mulazim ghalti kar bethta hai to wo ise yaksar nazar andaaz kar dete hain
log inhe maghroor samajhte hain lekin wo bohat aajzi aur inkesari wale insaan hain

jab reham khan se pocha gaya ke siyasat se qataa nazar imran ko aur kya pasand hai to in ke kehna tha ke jab main is ghar mein aai to mera tassur kuch is tarah ka tha ke ooo hooo imran ko to daal dalliya bhi thek tarah se nahi milta
agar main kitchen mein naya item banao to in ka radde amal kuch is tarah ka hota hai
imran bohat qabil e tareef hain kyun ke wo kisi bhi tarah ke halaat mein reh sakte hain wo bila wajah naak bhawen charane wale aadmi nahi hain
main ne imran ko bata diya tha ke main koi samjhota karna nahi chahti
main apne bachon ko bohat azaadi deti haon jo ke shayad bohat se deegar waldain nahi dete
mere bhi kuch usool hain lekin is tarah ke nahi ke shor na karo ya mauseeqi na suno
hamara bohat shor sharabe wala ghar hai aur bachon ke sath hamare talluqat bohat sidhe aur aasaan hai
to reham khan ne kaha ke imran bohat he ache baap hain

suleman he ko dekh lijiye jo imran aur jamaima ka barha beta hai wo is baras saal ka ho jaega lekin ab bhi wo apne baap ke sath chimat kar sota hai aur mera khayal hai ke waldain ke liye ladkon ke sath laad piyar karna bohat zarori hai chahe wo kitne he barhe kyun na ho jae
mere bachon ko to mujhe ziyada laad piyar karne se rokna parhta hai kyun ke mein in ke ird gird he mandlati rehti hon yahan tak ke inhe kehna parhta hai ke mum minute ke liye he thehar jae
step father ki hesiyat se bhi imran bohat ache hain
hamare masaiyl sirf hamare bachon se mutalliq the
hamare waise he tafarrukat hain ke jaise aam waldain ke hote hain
aap imran se yeh tawaqqa nahi rakh sakte ke wo sab he choti chezon ke barey mein sochenge lekin wo bohat naram dil aur hassas insaan hain
wo aise aadmi hain ke inho ne kabhi apni sabqa biwi jamaima ko bura bhala nahi kaha bal ke in ke sath bahmi aihteraam ka talluq barqarar rakha hai
main aksar apne beton se kehti hon ke tum in ki yani imran ki tarah baat karte ho in ke jaisa libaas pehante ho to in jaisa insaan banne ki bhi koshish karo
in ke jaise shohar bano in ke jaise sabiq shohar bano in ke jaise bhai bano aur in ke jaise bete bano
nae nae shadi shuda afraad ke liye sab se aeham tip yeh hai ke in ke dil mein bachon ki shadeed khuwahish honi chahiye
hamare han aam taur par shadi shuda afraad is liye maa baap banne ki khuwahishmand hote hain ke muaashra in se yehi tawaqqa kar raha hota hai
main samajhti honk e kuch log ache waldain banne ka rujhaan rakhte hain aur kuch log is se mehroom hote hain
lehaza sab se achi tip to yehi hai ke husool aulaad ke khuwahishmand hon aur bachon ki parwarish se lutf uthae
dosri aeham tip yeh hai ke aap ko apne bachon ke sath ziyada se ziyada waqt guzarna chahiye log hairan ho kar mujh se pochte hain ke main ne
akeli maa ke taur par kaise bache paal liye lekin haqiqat yeh hai ke in ki parwarish karna mere liye taza hawa ki manind farhat bakhsh tha
main ne hamesha prime time talk shows kiye aur pakistan ke tamam he siyasatdano ke interview kiye
tumhari urdu achi nahi hai tum bohat naram mizaaj ki ho yahan bohat chillana parhta hai larhna parhta hai lekin mere khayal mein yeh logon ki zihanat ki tauheen hai
inhe aik mauqa milna chahiye ke wo khud is baat ka faisla kar saken ke kya behtar hai aur kya nahi
main ne kisi bhi lihaaz se khud ko tabdeel nahi kiya

apne sab se yaadgar interview ke barey mein inho ne bataya mujhe badam zari bohat achi lagi yeh wo pehli khatoon hai ke jis ne wafaq ke zair e intezam qabaili ilaqey fata se pehli bar azaad hesiyat mein election larha
is khatoon ko dekha kar mera hausla barha aur is interview ko androne bairoon mulk bohat ziyada dekha gaya
pehli baat to yeh hai ke imran khud ko politician nahi samajhte is liye mera kaam aasaan ho gaya
wo samajhte hain ke wo aik mission par hain aur main bhi aisa he samajhti hon
haqiqat yeh hai ke main is hawale se koi dabao mehsoos nahi karti
log samajhte hain ke agar main kaam karna chahongi to imran khan mujhe mana karenge halan ke haqiqat is ke bar aks hai mujhe imran ne kabhi aisa nahi kaha
yaqinan inho ne mujh se shadi is liye nahi ki hogi ke mujhe tabdeel karen
inho ne baras mein shadi ka faisla karne se pehle yaqinan achi tarah ghaur o fikar kiya ho ga
yeh apni pasand se meri pehli shadi hai
main ne kuch dekhe bhale bagher he shadi ke liye in ki sherwani pasand karti thi
shadi wale din in ka bass nahi chal raha tha ke kisi tarah photosession jald az jald khatam karae aur khane ke liye beth jae
yeh aik bohat piyara din tha ke jo hum ne apni family aur bachon ke sath guzara

bharti jasus kashmir singh ki rahae ka mamla bhi aysa hi aik case tha kashmir singh ney bharat mein jaker pakistan mein apni ser germion key hawaley sey jo bianat dea un par pakistani halqon mein gahra gam o ghussa dekhney mein aya taham ansar burney ney kaha key un ka zameer mutmaen hay kashmir singh ney bhi apni rahai key hawaley sey ansar burney key kirdar ko saraha

mein asma jahangir ka nam mulk ger shohrat hasil ker gea keonkey iss waqt un key walid malik ghulam jilani ke hibse beaja key khelaf un ki patishion par faisla detey huae supreem court ney chief marshallah aid ministrater jeneral yehya khan ko ghasibqarar dea tha pakistan ki tarekh aur qanoon ki ketabon mein moqadma asma jilani casekey nam sey mashhoor hua
llb degree asma jahangir mein llb ki degree hasil kerney key bad buniadi insani haqooq aur tahaffuz nuswan key lea mein apni jaddo jahad ka agaz kea punjab women lowers asosi aishion qaiam ki

yon to asma jahangir ki puri zindagi hi amriaat aur insani haqooq ki khelaf warzion key khelaf jado jehad kernay se ebarat hai aur unki khidmata ka kae bainul aqwami sithat par eteraf bhi kea ja chukka hay lakin un ka taza tareen karnama november se march tak general pervez musharraf ki amriat ke khelaf aur badeazan chief justics of pakistan iftikhar muhammed choudhry ki bahali ke haq mein chalae janey wali tahreek mein unka numaya hissa hai iss tehreek mein unki bher pure karkerdagi ka eteraf tamam halqon ki taraf se kea gea magar chief justice key haq mein tehreek chalaney ka matleb yea nahin tha key iftikhar muhammed choudhry un key kea kisi moqaddas gaeki hasiat ekhtaiar ker jatey yahi waja hay key jab supreme court key ful bench ki taref dey badnama e zamana nro key khelaf mukhteser faisla jari kea gea to iss faislay key baz nikat par apney tahaffuz ka izhar ker tey huea unhon ney iss par tanqeed bhi ki

mein unhain aqwam e muttahida ke tarqiati fund barae khawateeen ki taraf se millennium prize yani hazarey ke inam se nawaza gea mein asma jahangir ko lisl and leo eitinger prize mila

apne tibbi gudaz aur reham dili ki badolat imam bibi kisi ko musibat mein nahi dekh sakti thein

un ka aik aur tarika ye tha ke muhale ke gharib gharanon ki das bara saal ki teen char bachyon ko apne han le atein aur un ki kafeel ban jatein

jitna arsa wo larkiyan un ki tehwil mein rehtein wo un ki dekh bhal bilkul betiyon ki tarah kartein aur shadiyon ke waqat bhi un ko betiyon ki tarah rukhsat kartein

school aur college mein aap numaya hesiyat ki hamil thein

rana liaquat har mumkin had tak apne shohar ka hath batane ke elawa gharelo zimedariyan bhi pori kartein
begum liaquat ne un ki parwarish nihayat zimedari se ki

quaid e millat apni siyasi masrofiyat ki wajah se bachon par tawajah nahi de sakte the is leye ye zimedari mukamal tor par begum liaquat ke kandhon par aan pari aur unhon ne ye zimedari nihayat kamyabi se nibhai

ab liaquat ali khan aur begum liaquat par nai zimedariyan aan parein mashriqi punjab aur degar khiton se mahajireen ka jo selab umad para tha is ki bina par liaquat ali khan ka hath batane ke leye baqaidah khidmat aur bani no insan ki imdad ki tanzeem ka aghaz kiya
gharelo khawateen ye baat janti h na thein ke wo ghar se bahar bhi koi khidmat injam de saktein hain

un halat mein natajurbe kar khawateen ki tanzeem banana aur un se musibat zadgaan nadar mohtaj afrad ki khidmat ka kaam lena yaqenan mushkil tareen kaam tha lekin begum rana liaquat ali khan ne is kaam ka bera uthaya
is azeem kaam mein unhen jo kamyabi nasib hoi wo yaqenan heratnak hai

un ki qayadat mein natajurbekar pakistani khawateen khidmat e khalq ke leye jis tarah mutahid hoein aur kaam kiya wo apni missal aap hai begum liaquat ali khan ka sab se bara karnama pwayani aal pakistan anjuman khawateen ki tashkil aur tanzeem hai
is ki wajah se un ka naam pakistani tarikh mein hamesha zindah rahe ga
february ko pakistan bhar se unhon ne esi khawateen ko madu kiya jo zindagi ke mukhtalif shobon mein mufeed aur karaamad kaam anjam de rahein thein
ye pakistan ki tamam khawateen ki anjuman hai aur is mein shirkat ke leye kisi rutbe darje mazhab ya firqe ki qead nahi
is anjuman ka maqsad pakistani khawateen ki samaji taleemi aur saqafati islah hai
is ki shakhein pakistan ke charon sobon aur kafi zilon mein hain
apwa ki zer e nigrani kai school aur college khole gaye hain hospitals qaim kiye gaye hain amor e khanadari ka khas intezam kiya gaya hai
is tanzeem ka maqsad khawateen ki sahi tor par tarbiyat karna hai liaquat ali khan ki shahadat ko unhon ne nehayat hosle ke sath bardasht kiya aur is ke baad bhi apwa ki sargarmiyan jari rakhein

anna molka ahmed ki koshishon se mein ma fine arts ki classes ka ijra howa aur mein ba owners ka teen saala course bhi shuru howa
mein aap ne painters aur graphic designers ke leye peshawarana courses ka ijra kiya

mosam e garma ki tatilat mein aap apne khawand ke sath shumali elaqajat ki seer ke leye jatein aur qurat ke hasein manazir ko apne brush ki girift mein la kar na sirf dekhne walon ki aankhon ki dawat ka saman latein bal ke sath sath fan ke giran kardar namone bhi jama kar jatein
anna molka ahmed ke baad ane wale fankaron ne in shah paron se behad istefadah kiya aur art ki taraqi ka bais banne

ana molka ne landscape philosophical aur mazhabi paintings drawing aur mono mantel painting ke beshumar namone bator yadgar chore hain

bilquis edhi ke naam se kon waqif nahi
bilquis edhi bemisal samaji karkun abdul satar edhi ki nifs behtar hain
aur guzishta saalon se ye farz is khubi ke sath nibhati chali arahi hain ke aaj na sirf pakistani unhen ehtaram ki nazar se dekhta hai balke un ki belos khidmaat ka sherah beron e mulk bhi hai
pakistani quom unhen madar e pakistanke laqab se pukarti hai
yaqenan kuch afrad ese hote hain ke allah buzurg o bartar jinhen kuch khas kaamon ke leye muntakhib karta hai
aur aaj wo samaji karkun aur bilquis edhi foundation ki sarbarah ki hesiyat se pehchani jati hain
bilquis edhi ki karkardagi ka dairah is qadar wasi hai ke mukhtasir alfaz mein jis ka ahata mumkin nahi
bilquis edhi ne shohar ka sath dete howae foundation ke kaamon mein bharpor tarike se un ka sath diya
edhi center mein se qaim shudah jhula project ka charge bhi unhon ne bakhubi sanbhala

is project ke tehat ab tak mulk bhar se hazaron ki tadad mein unchahe bache panah hasil kar chuke hain bilquis edhi ne logon ke leye ye aam pegham jari kiya ke nchahe bachon ko jan se na marein balke unhen humare jhulon mein dal den
bilquis edhi pakistan bhar mein khososi tor se uraton aur bachon ke mamlat sanbhalti hain
wo ab tak hazaron gharib aur nadir larkiyon ki shadi ache gharanon mein karwa chuki hain
un ki dardmandi ka andaza is baat se lagaya ja sakta hai ke dehshat gardi ke waqeyat aur mukhtalif hadsat mein halak hone walon ke bkhire aza ko mutadid martaba unhon ne apne hathon se yakja kiya
hazaron lawaris bachon ko pal pos kar bara kia aur taqreban lakh larkiyon ko un ke ghar pohchane ka neek kaam sar anjam deya
bilquis edhi ko in khidmaat ke eteraf mein filal e imtiazaur amon magsaysayaward ke elawa mutafariq inamaat aur ezazat mil chuke hain jin ki tafseel khud unhen bhi yad nahi
tahum un ka kehna hai ke b main ne ezazat wasol karne chord eye hain
aur main sirf kaam par tawajah dena chahati hun kyun ke waqat kam hai aue kaam bohat ziyadah hain na jane kab humara bolawa aajaye

helen keller ki kahani aik behri aur nabena bachi ki kahani hai jis ne apne andhe pan aur behre pan ke bawajod na sirf aala taleem hasil ki balke mayos logo ke dilon mein apne josh aur walwale se himat paida ki
miss salon helen keller ki zindagi mein inqelab ban kar warid hoein
helen keller ke hath par pani ke nal se pani gira kar us ko pani ki hije yaad karati
yahan tak ke helen keller ke tajasus ki tasqeen ke liye miss salon ne helen ki hatheli par ande se choza nikalne ka aamal tak mukamal karaya
is tarah helen keller ki zindagi mein taleem ka aghaz howa aur baad mein wo mukhtalif marahil te kar ke aik shandar musanifa bani
is dor mein helen keller bohat mehanti aur hoshiyar shagird sabit hoi aur bari asani aur josh se us ne ubhri hoi tehriron ko parhna shru kar diya
us ke khatot se us ki ghair mamoli sojh bojh aur us ke dilchaps khayalat ka andaza hota tha

helen ko ye jan kar bari khushi hoi ke aur bhi bache ese the jo us ki zaban mein batein karte the aur wo jab garam joshi se us ka hath dabate to use mehsos hota ke us ke un ke darmiyan aik ghair mari rishta hai

mein jab helen keller ki umar saal thi to us ki ustani us ko mukhtalif mashkein karati thi jin ki madad se helen keller mukhtalif english horf e tahaji ki awazein likalne ke qabil ho gai taham wo bhar por awaz na likal sakti thi aur us ke bole howe alfaz sirf us ki ustani hi samajh sakti thi
mein helen keller ne unani latini german algebra aur geometry ke imtehanat pass kiye aur red cliff college mein dakhil ho gai
college mein us ne agarcha nihayat masrofiyat ke aalam mein char saal guzare lekin is arse mein us ne do kitabein zeri zindagi ki kahaniaur jijaiyattakhliq kein
in kitabon mein us ne is yaqeen ka izhar kiya ke musarrat aur shadmani ki badotal is qabil ho saki hai ke wo masher ki khidmat kar sake

college ki rasmi taleem diploma hasil karne par khatam ho gai tahum us ki ghair rasmi taleem kabhi khtam na hoi aur ingrezi francici aur german kutub ko parhti rahi aur naye josh o kharosh se likhti rahi
dosron ki madad kar ke wo khushi mehsos karti
rafah e aam ke kaamon aur qalmi imdad se kabhi gurez na karti
helen keller ki ziyadah tar koshishein apne hi jese degar nabena afrad ke leye waqf thi
helen keller zati tor par dosron ko himat delati aur un ke dilon mein zindah rehne ki lagan barhati
wo nabena afrad ke mesa chastise commission ki rukun bhi banni
isi tarah nabena aur behre afrad ki degar kai anjomanon ki rukniyat bhi us ne qabol ki
rafta rafta us ki shurat barhne lagi aur aik waqat aaya ke us ke pas america aur europe ke dor daraz shehron se bhi khutot aane ka bhi silsila shuru ho gaya
helen keller ke doston ka halka bohat wasi tha
us dor ke mushahir ke sath us ke gehre taluqat the
wo nihayat bahimat aur deleer khaton thi
helen keller ne tamam umar mayosi ko qareeb na phataken deya aur apne azam o himat se mazoron aur sehatmandon ki duniya mein aik esi roshan missal qaim kar di jis ko duniya yad rakhe gi
justice retire majida rizvi bhi un basaor khawateen mein shamil hain jo mehaz apne leye nahi jetein

majida rizvi ne apne liye apni jid o jehad aur mehnat se aik buland aur qabil e fakhar muqam hasil kiya majida rizvi pakistan ki pheli khatoon judge hone ka ezaz hasil hai aur apne shube ki wo behad laiq aur muhtaram shakhsiyat hain
jab main ne law ki taleem hasil ki to mery samne amli zindagi mein apni salahiyaton ke istemal ka jazba aur lagan karwatein lene laga
mahene bad jab mujhe qanon ke shube mein amli tor par ane ki ijazat mil gayi to january mein meri enrolment hoi aur is ke bad main ne phir kabhi palat kar nahi dekha
apne kaam mein is tarah magan hoi ke mujhe khud bhi ye ehsas bad meinhowa ke koi undekhi lagan hai jo mujhe yun din raat masrof rakhe howae hai

janab justice iftikhar muhammad chaudhry ki qayadat mein dajanon judge dat gaye
taqat ko qanoon manne se inkar kar deya

tareekh mein pheli bar pco ka hokum nama ghair aaini qarar de diya gaya ke chief justice aur un ke rufaqa ne khamoshi se retire hone ke bajaye medan e jung mein dad e shujaat dene ka fasala kar leya tha
judge bartaraf howae gharon mein nazar band howae lekin awam ki taqat ne khud ko manwa leya
azadana aur munsifana intekhabat karwane pare awami numainde iqtedar ke ewanon mein pohanche aur pervez musharaf ka chiragh gul ho gaya
chief justice iftikhar muhammad chaudhry aur un ke rofaqa ko awam ne dobara koye insaf ki pasbani bakhsh de
janab justice iftikhar muhammad chaudhry aur aala adliya awami etemad ki dolat se malamal hain
pakistan ki tareekh mein pheli bar chief justice ka shumar maqbol tareen shakhsiyat mein hone laga ahi
ye nare abhi tak faza mein zindah hain iftikhar tere jan nisar beshumar beshumar zulm ziyadati aur nainsafi ki mari hoi quom muntazir nigahon se supreme court ki taraf dekh rahi hai
umeed ka deya abhi tak jal raha hai
unhon ne razakarana tor par mahaz ki agli safon mein larne ke leye apni khidmat pesh kein aur is position mein larte howe dushman ke kai hamle pipa kiye
us waqat tiger hil par pakistan ki northern light infantry ke jawan ka qabza tha jin ke aik rukun havaldar lalak jan shaheed the

isi haqiqat ko mad e nazar rakhe lalak jan pahari par chayi dhund aur apne sathiyon ki firing ki aar mein pahari se niche uthre aur pahari elaqe mein rehne se hasil hone wali tabiyat ka faidah uthate howae unhon ne is tarah barodi surangein bichaein ke agar bharti aage barhne ki koshish karte to un se takraye bagheir na rehte
is ke bad dushman ko dawam mein lane ke leye supahiyon ne apni firing aahista aahista kam karte howae bilkul rok di
taqreban ghante bad un ki taraf se koi jawab na milne par hosla pa kar bharti foji aage barhe aur havaldar lalak jan shaheed ki bichai hoi surangon ke shikar ho gaye
bhartiyon ko bhari nuqsan howa
senior sathi hone ke nate havaldar lalak jan shaheed ne apne sathiyon ki kaman sanbhal li aur unhen hidayat ki ke wo kisi aik jagah ruke bagheir musalsal firing karte rahein
in fojiyon ne mehaz apni maharat aur hosle ke bal par dushman ka aik aur hamla paspa kar deya
is ke bad azam o himat ke naqabil e yaqen muqable mein akele lalak jan ne bharti foj ke do units ko ghante tak rok kar rakha
bila akhir bharti foj peche hatne par majbor ho gaye
bharti fojiyon ke peche hatne ke bad se pakistani foji havaldar lalak jan shaheed ki madad ko pohanch gaye
havaldar lalak jan shaheed ne kaha ke wo hospital ke bistar par apni jan nahi dena chahate un ki khawahish hai ke un ki jan medan e jang mien kaam aaye
zakhmi havaldar lalak jan shaheed ne is mission ke leye apni khidmat pesh kar dein
captain ne phele ye kaam unhen dene se inkar kar deya lekin havaldar lalak jan shaheed kisi na kisi tarah unhen qail karne mein kamyab rahe
havaldar lalak jan ne aik barod ka thela pusht par bandha aur ak sanbhal kar bharti gola bari ke darmiyan tiger hill se utre aur kisi ki nigah mein aaye bagheir khofiya banker tak ja pohanche
jab lalak jan ne ese uraya to aik zabardast dhamaka howa aur bharti foj ka gola barod barbad ho gaya
ne jawabi fire kiya unhen goliyan lagein lekin shaheed hone se phele wo aik tawel waqat tak bhartiyon ko jawab dete rahe aur unhen roke rakha
jab un ka jism mila to tab bhi un ki gun un ke sene se lagi hoi thi
lalak jan shaheed shumali elaqajat se nishan e haider hasil karne wale phel sipahi the
jurat o bahaduri ki esi masalein pori duniya mein tariq mein khal khal hi dekhne ko milein gi
jab take se sapot zindah hain dushman humari sarzameen ki tarfa meli nigahon se dekhne ki himat nahi kar sakta
hashim ko bachpan se hi squash se dewangi ki had tak shouq tha
hashin khan ne uss jaga ko daryaft kar liya tha jo unki aur unkey mulk ki waqar aur shohrat ki waja bani
squash se hashim khan ne aisa rishta qaim kiya jo lazwal bana unhon ne khud zati tour per aur phir unke khandan ke farzandon ne iss khail se aisa nata jora ke tareekh hi badal dali
shaid hi kisi khail mein kisi aik khandan ne aik khail per etni hukmarani ki hai
khan family ne squash per taweel hukumat ki hai aur yeh kahna baja hoga ke unhon ne squash ki tareekh ko apne haton se likah hai

iss lazwal kahani ki ibteda hashim khan se hoti hai hashim ke mutaliq kaha jata hai ke unhon ne squash ke khail ko hi tabdeel kardia squash se dilchapsi ka yeh alam tha ke woh garam dopher mein officers ko khelta dekhte rahte they aur jab gaind court ke bahar jati thi to uss ka taqub kerke usey wapis court mein phenk detey they
jab afsaran khail ker lot jate they to yeh hashim ke court mein dakhil hone ka waqt hua karta tha woh chandni raton mein dair tak akele hi khelte rahte they yahi waja hai ke un ka stemina lajawab tha
hashim khan gaind ke peachey bhagte bhagte kabhi nahein thakte they
thakawat naam ki cheese se to who waqif hi nahein they
hashim khan hairat angaiz quwat deikh ker unke sathi pareshan ho jaya kerte they
hashim naqabil yaqeen salahyaton ke malik they
hashim cheete ki tarah phurti se gaind ball per lapakte they aur aise qabil e deed strokes khelte they is ka tasawar bhi mumkin nahein tha
isi liye kaha jata hai ke hashim ne squash ke kai strokes ijad keay yeh strokes sirf wahi khail sakte they
inn strokes ki badaulat hashim khan ne shuru se hi shohrat kamai aur apne harifon per dabao qaim kerne mein kamyab rahe
hashim ne squash ki dunia mein qadam rakhte aik toofan barpa keya
all india champion abdul bari hashim ka pahla shikar bane yeh ki bat hai

abdul bari uss waqt ke behtareen khelari mane jate they jinhein drop short lagane mein khasi maharet hasil thi lakin hashim ke samne hetyar dalne pare amm khelari abdul bari ke drop short ka jawab dene sey qasir tha lakin hashim ne apne pehle hi drop short ko flap ker deya

mein bombay mein hone wale all india tournament mein shekhst khane ke bad abdul bari har bar hashim khan ka shikar bante rahe abdul barika zor toot chuka tha hashim khan ne abdul bari ki har martaba shikasht sey do char ker ke apni mokammal bartari ka saboot deya

lakin hashim khan ko rastah faraham keya gaya aur chandah akhttha ker ke unhein qismat azmai ke leay england rawana ker deya gaya mein british open ki shirket ke leay hashim pahonch gaey aur atey hi unhon ne dhamaka ker deya

british open sey chand din pehle squash opoen ka ineqad hua jis mein champion miser ke mahmood alkareem bhi shirket ker rahe they mahmood guzashta char salon sey yeh tournament jeettey chale arahe they aur umeed yahi thi ke woh panchween martaba bhi kamyab lotein gein

lakin woh final mein hashim khan sey takra gaey europe ke sarzameen per pehla tournament khelne wale hashim khan ne chand minton mein hi mahmood ka final mein safaya ker deya iss khabar sey squash ki dunia mein aik tahalka mach gaya yeh aik bahot bara set tasawar keya gaya

aor pher woh ghari agae is ka sab ko intezar tha london ke lance down club mein british open ka agaz hua mahmood alkareem ne apne title ke dafa mein masroof they magar unki bad qismati ke final mein aik martabah pher hashim khan hi un ke samne they

hashim ne mahmood ke sath british open mein bhi wahi salook keya jo unhon ne squash open final mein keya tha mahmood ko aik martabah pher ibretnak shikasht ka samna kerna para aur almi title pehli martabah pakistan ke pass agaya
ab kisi ko hairat nahein thi ab sab log mutfiq ho chuke they ke hashim khan hi asli champion hai yahein sey iss kahani ka agaz hota hai khan family squash ki dunia mein aie aur cha gaie

british open per khan family ki ajarah dari shuru ho gaie hashim khan ne sath martabah iss tournament ko jeeta iss dauran un ke chote bhai azam khan kazan roshan khan aur bhanje mohibullah khan ne bhi apni salahyaton ka loha manwaya

aur ke darmeyan hone wale british open final mein rasai hasil karne wale khelaryon mein sey ka taluq khan family sey tha hashim martabah british open ke final mein pahonche jabke unke bhai azam khan bhi sat martabah final kheley

azam ko yeh azaz hasil hua ke unhon ne british open ka sab sey kem waqt mein jeeta apne hi kazan roshan ko bari maharet set zair keya tha yeh bara hairat angaiz moqabla tha jis mein azam ne roshan ko koi moqa nahein deya shaiqeen to yeh bhi samajhne lage they ke momkin hai ke roshan mokammal tor per fit nah on lakin aist koi bat nahein thi azam khail per mokammal tor per chaey huey they aur roshan jaise azeem khelari bhi bea bes ho gaey they

iss aik tarfa final ke bad hi british open ke muntazmeen ne faisla keya tha ke teesre aur chouthe position ke leay bhi final wale din hi moqablah hua kare ga take shaiqeen ko khail ka lutf hasil ho sake
hashim ne jald hi american squash mein apna moqam bana liya
hashim khan ne bartanya se zayada america mein tournament jeete
barhti umer ke bawajood hashim america aur canada mein hone wale moqablon mein sur khuru rahe

jab hashim azam aur roushan ne american cricket ko khair baad kaha to un ki nasal ne kamyabi ke safar ko jari rakha mohibbullah khan tek american tournament jeette rahe pher hashim ke bare sahebzade sharif khan agae

north american title sal mein martabah jeet ker sharif ne apne walid aur apne khandan ka ser mazeed uncha keya american cricket mein gair mamooli kar kerdagi un ki ala salahyaton ka munh bolta saboot thi
ki dahai mein khan family keg air mamooli karnamon ki badault pakistan squash ki dunia mein sare fahrist raha

aftab jawed british amateur o champion ship jeetne mein kai martaba kamyab rahe balke unhon ne to yeh title teen sal laga tar jeeta mein yeh title jeet ker british amateur champion ship ki sala tareekh mein woh teesre khelari they jinhein hat trick ka ajaz hasil hua

ke bad jab mohibbullah khan ne british open title jeeta pakistan ko yeh ejaz mein hasil hua iss martaba dono pakistani khelari qamar zaman aur gogi allauddin pahonche they lahza title to pakistan ana hi tha qamar ne gogi ko shikast de ker pahli martaba open jeetne ka ejaz hasil keya

almi cricket mein kai umda khelaryon ki maujudgi ke bawajood jaif hint sey tek british open ka ejaz jeette rahe hint bahot achcha khelte they aur un ki ala technic ko matt dene ke leay kisi bahot hi azeem khelari ki zaroorat thi

iss azeem hasti ka nam jahangir khan tha jis ne hint ko squash ko khair bad kahne per majboor ker deya jahangir ki kahani iss fateh alam ki kahani hai jo apni na qabil yaqeen salahyaton ki bunyad per bagai ruke jadoo jagata raha unhein squash ka sikender e azam bhi kaha ja sakta hai jis ke samne koi ruk nahein pata tha

jahangir ne squash ki dunia mein mein qadam rakah tha iss sal australia mein hone wali world champion ship mein unko iss leay moqa deya tha ke woh chand din pahle hi beemar per jane ki waja sey mokammal tour per sehatyab nahein huey they lakin issi sal jahangir ne sal ki umerw mein world amateur title jeet ker yeh sabit ker deya ke uski shakal mein aik tareekh saz khelari chupa hua hai aur ane wale salon mein bilkul aisa hi hua

jhangir khan ke bare bhai tourism khan bhi aik manjeh hue khelari they tourism khan dunia ke bare khelaryon ki fahrist mein they aur inter national squash players association ke sadar bhi they un ke kazan rahmat khan dunia ke behtareen khelaryon ki saf mein shamil ho chuke they rahmat ke walid nasrullah khan air land ke juna bair ligtan ke coach rah chuke they

rahmat khan aur torsam khan ka irada tha ke woh england mein aik achche squash club mein malkana haqooq hasil ker lein aur wahan jahangir khan ko bola ker training di jae take woh australia ke haif hint ki mosalsal perwaz ko rokne ka bandobast ker sakein
jahangir khan apne barae bhai torsam ke khail sey bahot motasir they

rahmet ne jahangir khan ko dobara squash kort mein lane mein aham kirdar ada keya rahmet ko yeh andaza tha ke jahangir mein khudad salahyatein maujood hain aur umda training aur coatching sey un ke khail mein mazeed nikhar paida ho sakta hai

rahmet ne apne khandan ke buzurgon aur pakistan inter national air lines ke ohdedaron ko razi ker leya ke england jaker hi jahangir woh sare ezazat hasil ker sakta hai jis ki sab ko tamanna hai rahmet khan ko ejazat to mil gai lakin ajpne mansoobe ko amli jama pehnane ke leay unhein do sal ki mohlet di gai

rahmet khan ne iss challenge ko qabool ker leya aur apne mishan pewr rawana ho gae unhein yeh bata deya gaya tha ke nakami ki surat mein qaum ka unhein ko kerna pare ga rahmet khan ko na jane jahangir mein keya nazar agaya tha ke woh shooru sey hi pur umeed dekhai dete they

aur theek do sal bad woh khab haqeeqat mein tabdeel ho gaya woh mission kamyab raha jis per rahmet khan rawana huey they november torsam khan ka inteqal hua tha aur november ko jahangir ne canada ke shaher toronto mein jaif hint ko hara ker nae almi champion banne ka ejaz hasil keya

simi final mein jahangir ne hadayat jahan ko shikst di thi jabke hint ne doosre simi final mein faqmer zaman ko haraya tha sala hint world open mein naqabil taskher chale arahe they aur sey hone wale iss tournament mein har bar fateh lout rahe they

hint ne pehla game sey jeeta magar minut tek chalne wale iss game sey andaza hone laga tha ke jahangir hathyar dalne ke mood mein nazar nahein ate minut ke taweel dauranya wale pehle game mein hi sala hint ko tawaqat sey zayada jaddo jahed karna pari thi

sala jahangir ne hint ko itna zayada pehle hi game mein thaka deya tha ke un ki tawanai mein kami nazar ane lagi thi hint apne harifon ko thaka ker harane mein mashhoor they lakin iss roze woh khud shikar ho rahe they yeh umda mansooba bandi ka nateja tha jahangir ne pehla game iss andaz mein khela tha ke usey zayada sey zayada lamba keya ja sake
jahangir apni shason mein kamyab rahe aur agle teen game sirf minut ke ander jeet leay iss tarah hint ki kamyabyon ka silsila khatam hua aur un ki jaga aik naujawan pakistani ne le li

aur yahan se aik ahad ki shuruat huein aenda panch salon tek jahangir khan ko iss dunia ka koi bhi khelari hara na saka iss dauran unhon ne sey zayada matches khele aur har martaba kamyabi hasil ki yeh aisa record hai jis ki misal squash mein to keya kisi aur khail mein bhi nahein milti
iss zamane mein jahangir ke khelaf aik match to keya aik game ya sirf aik point hasil kerna bhi un ke hareef ke leay fakhar ki bat samjhi jati thi

november mein newzi land ke roos norman ne woh karnama anjam deya jis mein guzashta panch sal sey bzayada arsa mein har aik nakam raha tha norman kai martaba jahangir sey shikast kha rahe they lakin ke world open final mein squash ki dunia ka azeem tareen khelari zair ho hi gaya
jahangir ne chand hi dino bad norman ko kai moqablon mein hara ker world open ki shikast ka badla le leya aur apni kamyabton ka silsila jari rakha

london hi mein training hasil karne wale pakistani naujawan jansher khan mein squash ki ufaq per ubhre aur jahangir khan ke leay aik sakht khan hareef sabit huey jansher ke bare bhai mohibbullah khan junior bhi aik achche khelari they jinhon ne ka british open final khela tha

jansherbhi bila shuba aik azeem khelari they un ka moqabla jahangir khan ke sath martaba hua ke world open final tak dono baraber yani matches jeete they akhri moqabla jansher ne jeeta iss tarah un ke darmeyan record ho gaya
jahangir ki retirement ke baad almi satah per jansher pakistan ki wahid umeed hua kerte they jansher ne apne weaqt ke behtareen khelaryon ko mosalsal harate rahe aur khud shazonadir hara kerte they
bradman ke des australia ke mayanaaz batsman bakamaal fielder aur bemisaal captain ricky ponting ko naqadeen aur shaiyqeen har lihaaz se aik lajawaab cricketer tasleem karte hain
in ka shumar apne mulk he nahi duniya ke kamiyab tareen captains mein hota hai
wo captain kya bane in ki bating aur bhi ziyada karari ho gai
jis ka khamyaza mukhalif team ke bowlers ko bhugatna parhta hai
ricky duniya ke iklote batsman hain jinho ne martaba aik calendar saal ke dauran test matches mein se zaiyd runs score kiye
ricky ponting ki qiyadat mein yellow shirts new dobara world cup jeeta
inho ne test centuries banai hain aur is muaamley mein sirf sachin tendulkar se piche hain
ricky ponting ko one day cricket mein australia ki taraf se sab se ziyada runs aur centuries banane ke aezaaz hasil hai
ricky ponting mein wisden leading cricketer in the world aur mein wisden cricket of the year ka aezaaz bhi hasil kar chuke hain
december ko australia ki riyasat tasmania ke area launceston mein aankh kholne wale ricky thomas ponting ko apni salahiyaton ka loha manwane ke liye ziyada intezar nahi karna parha
inho ne mein sirf baras ki umar mein he one dau ben ul aqwami matches aur test matches ka apna khata khol liya tha
in ka daur e urooj us waqt shuru hua jab mein inhe kangaroos ke one day squad aur phir saal bad he test team ka bhi captain bana diya gaya

aedaad o shumar ke aaiyne mein dekha jae to ricky ponting test matches mein centuries aur half centuries ki madad se runs bana chuke hain test matches mein in ka oasat hai jab ke one day international matches mein inho ne ke oasat se runs score kiye hain

candidates ki list khasi taweel hai aur is mein steve waugh ellen barden sachin tendulkar aur brian lara jaise bohat se shohra aafaaq batsman shamil hain lekin aedaad o shumar ricky ponting ke haq mein gawahi dete hain
hashim ko bachpen se hi squash se dilchaspi thi
khail ka talent un mein shooru se hi maujood tha aur achchey khelaryon mein shoomar keye jate they
apni aala salahyaton ki bunyad per hashi khan ko british air force mein bahasyat squash coach faiz kiya gaya tha
mein pehli mertaba munaqid hone wali pakistan professional squash champion ship ke final mein sala hashim khan ne sala raushan khan ko shikast di
un mushkil halat mein bhi hashim khan ne squash se apna rishta nahein tora aur sakht jaddo jahad kerte rahe
hashim khan ko apni salahyaton ka andaza us waqt hua jab unke rishtedar abdul bari ke british open final mein pahonche
chand hi salon mein hashim ke khail ka meyar buland ho chukka tha lakin unhein uska ihsas nahein tha
hashim khan iss baat se bakhubi waqif thay ke un ka khail abdul bari se kafi behter hai
mein pakistan air force ke officers ne chanda jama ker ke hashim ki british open champion ship mein shirket ke liye england rawana kiya
yeh intehai hairer ki baat thi ke woh players khelari jise apne watan mein khelne ki tamam sahooltein mayasser nahein thein duniya ke number aikno one khelari player ko harane mein kamyab ho gaya
lakin hashim khan ke khail mein josh tha woh walwala tha aur sub se barh ker woh jazba tha jis se woh apne hum asar khelaryon ko zair kerne ki maharat rakhte thay
apne ala khail se hashim khan ne poori dunia ko hairat mein dal diya tha
tek woh british open mein na qabil e taskheer rahe yani yeh title woh mertaba lagatar jeete
ke final mein unhein roshan khan ne shikast di lakin mein hashim khan aik mertaba phir sukhuru huye
iss tarah hashim khan satween mertabatime british open jeetne mein kamyab huye jo aik naya record tha
woh apne daur ke azeem tareen khelari samjhe jate thay
saal ki umer mein bhi woh aik naujawan khelari ko farig kerne ki salahiyat rakhte thay
hashim khan ke khail ke ahem khubi yeh thi ke woh kisi bhi lamha himmat nahein harte thay
kaha jata hai ke unhon ne squash mein kayi new shorts ijaad kiye

hashim khan ka short jo sab se zaida mashoor huwa aur jo dekhne se taluq rakhta tha woh four hand cross kort drop short tha jis ke zariye hashim khan ne na sirf apne hareefon ko bikheir ker rakh diya tha balke uss se hashim khan ne motadid points hasil kiye thay
roshan khan iss azeem tareen khelari ke walid hain jis ne iss khelon ko naya andaz diya
roshan khan ke sahebzade jahangir khan ka nam squash ki tareekh mein sunahre hooroof se likha jata hai
roshan khan khud bhi apne daur ke aik behtareen khelari thay
roshan aur hashim pakistan ke ibtedai dino ke do super star thay
unko shikst de ker roshan ne ye sabit ker diya tha ke squash hi misr ki bartari ikhtetam ki taraf gamzen hai

misr ke mahmood alkareem ko ke dunlop open ke final mein hara ker roshan khan ne apne roshan mustaqbil ki naweed sunayi thi mahmood char martaba british open title jeet chuke thay aur apne waqt ke ala tareen khelari player mane jate thay
roshan khan bari jawan merdi se hashim khan ka moqabla kerte thay
kayi tournament ke final mein hashim ke haton shikst khane ke baad roshan khan ne akhir kar ke british open final mein hashim khan ko zair ker hi deya
iss tarah roshan khan british open ka izaz hasil kerne wale doosre pakistani khelari ban gaye
mahreen ne iss series ko world champion ship series qarar diya tha

mein hashim khan aur roshan ne australia and new zealand ka daura kiya un dono ko wahan aik series khelne ke liya madu kiya gaya tha ta ke unka khail dekh ker maqami khelari apne khail mein nikhar paida karein teen matchon ki series roshan khan ne se jeet li thi
iss tarah ye roshan ke liye aik bahot bari kamyabi thai
cricket ki duniya ne ab tak jo azeem tareen player paida kiye in mein brian lara top of the list hain

lara ne college ke tournament school boy league mein runs fee innings ki oasat se runs banae jab wo saal ke the to inhe pehli baar naujawan players mein shamil kiya gaya aur under ki numaiydegi karne ka mauqa mila brian lara trinidad and tobago mein football aur table tennis bhi khela karte the magar in ka khayal tha ke cricket in ki kamiyabi ka raasta hai jo inho ne sach kar dikhaya
inhe cricket ki duniya mein the prince bhi kaha jata hai
brian lara aik aise batsman hain jis ke gunn cricket ki duniya ke shaiqeen aur cricketers sab he gaate hain
in ki salahiyaton ko dekhte hue inhe sir dawn bradman jawed miandad sir lan hatton sir garry sobers sunil berry richards aur sachin tendulkar jaise mayanaz batsman ki suff mein shamil kiya jata hai
inho ne west indies ki nakaam hoti hui team ko sambhala aur is ki kamiyabi ke liye sara bojh apne kandhon par utha liya
multan test mein inho ne jarihana andaaz se bating ki aur kisi bowler se riayat na karte hue double century score ki jise sab yaad rakhenge
brian lara ne test matches mein runs score kiye wo test matches mein sab se ziyada runs banane ke aitebar se duniya mein th number par hain
inho ne aik roza matches mein innings khel kar
wo munfarid aur barhe records ke maalik hain
roza cricket mein kae martaba sab se barhi inferadi innings khel kar aalmi record bana chuke hain

sir garry sobers ke runs ka saal tak aalmi record bana raha tha brian lara ne mein england ke khilaaf runs bana ka rise bhi torh diya phir australian batsman mathew haddon ne saal bad mein zimbabwe ke khilaaf runs bana kar in se yeh aezaaz cheen liya lekin brian lara ne sirf months ke bad he aik shandar innings england ke khilaaf khel kar runs bana kar dobara new record qaiym kar diya

chaudhry rehmat ali ne january ko ab ya kabhi nahinow or never ke naam se aik ketabcha shaya kiya jis mein na sirf aik alehda muslim watan ke qayam ki tajweej pesh ki gaye balkey majuza muslim watan ko pakiktan ke naam se mousom kiya gaya
chaudhry rehmat ali nay apni tajweej mein punjab sey p suba sarhad key afghanon sey a kashmir sey k sindh sey s aur balochistan sey tan ley ker unko apas mein jor ker pakistan banay
iss ke baad ye lafz taizi se maqbol hota chala gaya
hindustan ke mukhtalif alaqon mein na sirf pakistan ke naam se tanzemein qaim huein balke pakistan ke naam se akhbarat o jaraed bhi jari kiya gaya
pehla resala mein chaudhry rehmat ali ne cambridge britania sey jari kiya jo pakistan qaumi movement ka terjuman tha
hindustan mein haft roza pakistan june mein abbottabad soba sarhad sey nikla jis key editor syed ghulam hussain shah kazmi they

augusst ki nawab ahmed yar khan daultana ney apney aik mazmon mein ye kiyal zahir keya key congress ki policies ka natija yaqinan pakistan ki sorat mein baramed hoga

islam den e fitrat hai jis mein ese zawabit paye jate hain jo insani mizaj aur zaroriyat ke aan mutabiq hain
islam khatoon ki izat aur toqeer ka dars deta hai
isi fitri zarorat ke pesh e nazar islam khatoon ki izat o ahteram ki taked karta hai
kyun ke ye hawa ki beti ka mamla hai imtiaz ka nahi niswani nazakat aur hifz e maratib pesh e nazar hai kuch aur nahi
har musalman ko is baat par kamil iman rakhna chaheye ke islam insani hoqoq ka alam badar aur mashi aur samaji masawat ka dai hai
islam masher ke tamam afrad ke hoqoq ki zamanat deta hai aur kisi fard ya giroh ya jins ki bunyad par imtiaz islam ki roh ke khilaf hai
ye din khawateen ke hoqoq ki jid o jehad ki yad delata hai

phir mein america ki socialist party ne khawateen women ke masail hal karne ke leye women national commission banaya jis ne khawateen women ke almi din ke leye sifarishat mauratab kein ta ke khawateen women ke haq e ray dahi ke leye aik munazam muhim ka aghaz kiya jaye

social democratic woman society ne march ko new york mein khawateen ke hoqoq ke leye aik ijlas munaqed kiya jis ke nateje mein american socialist community ne mein february ke akhiri hafte mein khawateen ka alami din manane ka elan kar deya

socialist khawateen ne aur mein khawateen ke aki ijlas munaqid kiye aur women national commission ne mein socialist national congress ko sifarish pesh ki ke february ke akhiri itwar sunday ko khawateen women ka almi din qarar deya jaye
phir august mein copan hagan mein socialist conference munaqid ki gayi jis mein tajwiz de gayi ke is din ko almi satah par bhi khawateen ka din qarar diya jaye
conference ke doran ye tajwiz manzor kar li gai aur is tarah khawateen ka almi din wajod mein agaya
mein russia ki khawateen ne apne hoqoq manwane ke leye gharon aur factoryon se sarkon par akar aik pur josh muzahira kiya
is tarikhi waqeye ne khawateen ki duniya badal di
is muzahire ke bad peter grad mein hartaal hoi aur khawateen women ka ye ahtejaj is had tak phel gaya ke aik hafte ke andar zar nicolas dom medan chor kar bhagne par majbor ho gaya
almi satah par rosi khawateen ki is jurat ko saraha gaya aur russia mein march ko khawateen ka din qarar de diya gaya

ki dehai ke akhir mein khawateen ki tehrikon mein aik naya ubhar aaya to march ko almi yom e khawateen ke tor par manane ka mutalba aik pur zor tehrik ki shakal mein samne aaya aur socialist mumalik ke sath un mimalik mein bhi march ko khawateen ke din ke tor par manaya jane lag ajahan ye din dosri tarikon ko manaya jata tha
shuru mein socialist paas e manzar ke bais america ki taraf se is tajwiz ki mukhalfat ki jati rahi tahum mein wahan bhi march ko khawateen ka din tasleem kar leya gaya
se tak khawateen ki char almi conferences munaqid hoein jin ka maqsad duniya bhar ki khawateen ki numaindagan ko aik plate form par akhatta kar ke un ke masail ki nishan dahi karna tha
in conferences mein khawateen ke infaradi masailse le kar almi satah tak ke masail par tafsil se giftogo ki gai aur sifarishat par mushtamil elamiye bhi jari keye gaye
ye naya musawida e qanon mustaqbil mein pakistan mein khatoon ke muqam aur hoqoq ke taiyon mein bunyadi ahmiyat ka hamil hia
duniya ke har mullk mein aain ki bunyadi amarat insani hoqoq par khari hoti hai
in mein sheriyon ko khush haali azadi masawat izzat e nafas jise bunyadi hoqoq shamil hain
riyasat is dastawez ke zarye is baat ko tasleem karti hai ye wo har qemat par sheriyon ko ye hoqoq faraham kare gi aur in hoqoq par amal dar aamad ko yaqeni banane ke leye har mumkin iqdamat kare gi

khawateen ke hoqoq ki jab baat aati hai to march ka din is hawale se khasi ahmiyat ikhteyar kar jata hai ke har saal is din pori duniya mein is haqeqat ko tasleem kiya jata hai ye khawateen ke hoqoq bhi insani hoqoq hain aur ye ke mashi aur mashrati taraqi sanfi masawat ke baghair mumkin nahi

march ko agar khawateen ko un ke hoqoq dene ki baat hoti hai to har satah par is azam ka izhar bhi zarori hai ke bahesiyat insan khatoon ko izat aur masawi hesiyat dena ho gikhatoon ke khilaf hone wali istehsaal aur har shakal ke tashdud ko jar se ukharna ho ga
khatoon par har kisi ka tashadud khatam karne ke leye sirf qawanin bana dena hi kafi nahi balke unhen behtar banana aur un par baqaidah amal dar aamad ko yaqini bana bhi zarori hai
march ka din mehaz taqarir karne ka din nahi balke ye din duniya bhar mein khawateen ke hoqoq ki bahali ka din hai
aham baat ye bhi hai ke apne hoqoq ke hosol aur tahafuz ke leye mardon ki taraf dekhne ke bajaye khawateen ko khud bhi aik dosre ke hoqoq ka tahafuz karna ho ga
usi zamane mein behtaren mazmon lekhne par lord lanes down se tamgha hasil kiya

mutale ki adat un ki zindagi ka juz thi

jab parhte parhte thak jate to ehbab se parhwa kar sunte
parhne ke bhi uqat the aur likhne ke bhi un ki adat thi ke wo mazmon ko aik hi nashist mein pora lekhte
anuman e taraqi e urdu ki bunyad mein dehli mein rakhi gai jis ke phele muhtamim e aala molana shibli nomani the jo hyderabad mein beth kar anjuman ke intazamat dekhte the
us waqat anjuman e traqi e urdu ke liye molvi abdul haq lazim o malzom the
un ka naam abdul haq tha aur anjuman ka naam taraqi e urdu
molvi sahib ne apni rkar guzari se anjuman ko hindustan ki bawaqar anjuman bana deya
anjuman ka sab se shandar kaam qadem dakni adab aur shura e urdu ke tazkiron ki ashat hai
mukhtalif ulom ke tarajum tasanif talifat nisabi kutub aur angrezi urdu lughat ki tadwene se karname hain jo tarikh aur urdu ki kitab books mein hamesha jagmagate rahein ge
widya mandir scheme ke muhaz par anjuman taraqi e urdu ki yalgharon aur fatohat ki fehrist bari tawil hai aur ye sirf aik hi mard e mujahid ka kaam hai jise hum baba e urdu ke naam se yad karte hain
molvi adul haq hama jehat shakhsiyat aur apni zatmein aik aik anjuman the
urdu ke leye apni khidmat ke sile mein unhon ne baba e urdu ka khitab paya
wo aik mumtaz nasar nigar muhaqiq mahir e talem aur mutazim the

unhon ne nasar nigari mein sir syed aur hali donon ke asrat shamil keye aur un jesa hi aslob ikhteyar kiya wo sir syed ki tehriron se ziyadah mutasir howe is leye unhon ne sadgi aur salasat ke bawajud sir syed ki tehrir ki shagutagi ko pesh e nazar rakha aur hali jesi rokhi pheki tehrir lekhne se gurez kiya albata un ki nasar mein kush tabi aur sanjidgi ka aik haseen tawazun paya jata hai
un ki tehriron mein besakhtagi aur rawani hai
is leye kuch hazrat ke nazdek un ki tehrirein mazamin ke bajaye taqrir kehlane ki mustahiq hain
basakhtagi aur rawani ne molvi sahib ki tehriron mein bari dilkashi aur ranai peda kar di hai
wo apni rawani tehrir mein qari ko bhi apne sath baha kar le jate hain
unhon ne bila zarorat adaq zaban aur angrezi alfaz lekhne se gurez kiya
unhon ne hindi zaban ke subuk alfaz bhi istemal kiye jin se un ki nasar mein aik ajeeb se chashni peda ho gai
un ki tehriron mein ba payan khulos paya jata hai
un ki tehrir parh kar yun mehsos hota hai ka is ke alfaz moye qalam se nahi balke dil se nikle hon
isi sachai aur khulos ne molvi abdul haq ko shurat e aam aur baqa e dawam ata kiya
molvi abdul haq aik kamyab marqa nigar aur sawanah nawis hain
un ke tamam marqaat sachai aur ghair janibdari se ebarat hain

unhon ne jin afrad ki sawanah tehrir ki ya un ki shakhsiyat par izhar e khayal kiya un ki serat ke tama m pheloon par seer hasil behas ki phir sab se bari baat ye hai ke aam tor par bashtar marqa nigar ke bajaye apni zaat ko numaya karna chahate hain wo us ke aur apne zati taliqat ke hawale se ese waqeyat samne late hain jin mein un ki shakhsiyat bar bar numaya ho kar ati hai
taham baba e urdu ki marqa nigari is saqam se pak hai
wo apne qalm ko us ki shakhsiyat ki serat tak mehdod rakhte hain jis ka khaka tehrir kiya ja raha hai ya sawanah likhi ja rahi hai
taham agar kabhi musanif ki shakhsiyat jhalakti hai to is ka aks bara e naam hota hai jo aik chand jumlon ya aik adha paragraph tak mehdod rehta hai

unhon ne sirf marof aur aham shakhsiyat hi par qalm nahi uthaya balke naam dev mali aur noor khan jese aam admiyon ke khake bhi likhe kyun ke molvi abdul haq k na sirf phol hi mein aan nazar nahi ati wo to kante menbhi aik shan dekh kar mutasir ho jate hain
molvi abdul haq ka sab se bara karnama ye hai ke unhon ne urdu ke qadem sarmaye nazam o nasar ko daryaft karne aur is ka tahfuz karne ke silsile mein baqaidah aik tehrik chalai
is tehrik ke natije mein molvi sahib ki infiradi koshihson se urdu ke naamwar qadem shura aur nasar nigaron ke nadir o nayab tazkare qalmi kutub aur majmoi kalam dastiyab howe
nizami ki qadem masnoiyon phol bin nashati ki razm aama aur molla wajhi ki dastan sab ras ki daryaft molvi sahib ki sai musalsal se hi mumkin ho saki
molvi sahib ne qadem mehzotaat mein baqidah tehkik ki un par tabsare kiye unhen shaya karaya is koshishs ki badolat bashumar mehzotaat zewar e taba se arasta ho kar ehl e elm ke samne aye
urdu college ka qayam molvi abdul haq ka aik aur azeem karnama hai
is coolege mein fanon qanon science aur tejarat ki teleem urdu mein hi de jati hai
is college mein ma msc aur llm ki taleem bhi de jati hai jin ka zarya e taleem urdu hai
molvi abdul haq ne urdu ko pakistan ki qaumi zanban banane ke silsile mein zabardast jid o jehad ki

unhon ne na sirf apni taqriron aur tehriron ke zarye qaumi renumaon aur hukam ko mutawajah kiya balke mein unhon ne urdu ke haq mein aik shandar awami jaloos nikala jis ke shurka ki tadad aik lakh se zaid thi
in hi koshishon ka samar ye tha ke ke dastor mein urdu ko bahesiyat qaumi zaban ke taslim kar leya gaya
molvi sahib ne anjuman e taraqi e urdu ke zer e ahtemam do adad ilmi aur adbi jaraid urdu aur qaumi zaban bhi jari kiye
in jaraid mein anjuman ke maqasid ki tashher ke elawa mayari elmi aur adbi mazamin shura ka mayari kalam aur elaqai zabanon ke mazamin aur afsanon ke tarajum bhi shaya kiye jate hain
molvi abdul haq ne aik mustanad aur mayari angrezi urdu lughat bhi tarteb di

molvi abdul haq ki koshishon se karachi mein anjuman e taraqi e urdu ka aik jaded chapa khana anjuman press ke naam se qaim howa
is press ke qayam ki badolat anjuman ke leye apni kutub ki ashat mein bohat asaniyan peda ho gaein
anjuman ke apne risale urdu aur qaumi zaban esi press mein shaya howe

maroof actress model mathira ne mien apni all rounder performance se showbiz ke mukhtalif shobon par raaj karne ka aelaan kar diya
aik taraf to mathira film aur tv mien acting ke johar dikhaeyngi jab ke mezbani ke sath sath mauseeqi ki duniya bhi apni salahiyaten mutarif karwaengi

jab ke in ki video mukammal hote he aik ranga rang launching taqreeb ka ineqaad bhi kiya jaega

inho ne kaha ke main janti hon ke music aik mushkil kaam hai aur is ke liye music ki samajh bojh hona bohat zarori hai
main music ko samajhti hon aur jin logon ne meri awaaz sun rakhi hai wo jante hain ke main acha gaa sakti hon
isi liye main ne acting modeling aur hosting ke baad singing ke shobey mien qadam rakha hai

razia sheer khan bilkul aik ache trainer ke sath sath ache nutritionist ki bari ahamiyat hai
zahir hai ke aik balance diet aap ki karkardagi ko aage barhane mein mawin sabit hoti hai
is mein protein ka imtezaj aur pani ka istemal bari ahamiyat ka hamil hota hai
question apni karkardagi ko behtar banane ke leye rozana kitne ghante practice karti hain
unhen hukumat ki janib se har tarah ki support hasil hoti hai
yahan ke athletes job karne ke elawa zindagi ki tamam mushkilat bardasht karne ke sath sath kheelne ke leye waqat nikalte hain aur mulk ke leye bohat kuch karne ka jazba rkhte hain
main aik baat zaroro kahon gi ke in tamam mushkilat ke bawajod pakistan mein talent ki koi kami nahi hai
agar tartan track achi ho gi to aap ki training aur practice ka mayar bhi acha ho ga
achi tartan track par training ke doran aap enjoy karte hain
aap ko is mein bounce milta hai jis se karkardgi behtar bannane mein madad milti hai
question aik athlete ko apni karkadgi behtar banane ke leye ache joggers jote kitana aham kirdar ada karte hain

razia sheer khan haqiqat to ye hai ke mayari joggers mehange to hote hain lekin in ka balance bohat acha hota hai jo aap ki karkadagi ko na sirf behtar karta hai balke aap bohat acha mehsos karte hain
ye baat bilkul sahi hai ke mayari joggers majmoi karkardagi ko behtar banane mein dosri cheizon ke sath sath aham kirdar ada karte hain
question pakistan ki kis athlete khatoon se sab se ziyadah mutasir hain
razia sheer khan main pakistan ki international athlete shazia khan se bohat mutasir hun
main ne jab quomi satah par ibteda ki to na sirf main ne un ko ideal banaya balke un se training bhi li
ye ibteda mein un ki training ka hi natija tha ke mujhe un se bohat kuch sekhne ka moqa mila aur apni karkardagi ko behtar banane mein kamyab rahi
is se phele snidh games par nazaren hain jis mein aik martaba phir apni sabiqa achi karkardagi ko dohrana chahon gi
mujhe is baat ki khushi hai ke main ne ke games mein infaradi tor par sab se ziyadah gold medals leye the jo aik record hai
main chahon gi ke is record ko mazid behtar banao
razia sheer khan abhi to mereghar walon ne mujhe har tarh ka support kiya hai
main samajti hunk e karkardagi ko behtar banane aur tasasul ko qaim rakhne ke leye achi mulazimat ki bari ahamiyat hai

mohibullah ne mertaba british open ke final mein pahonche magar teeno mertaba woh azam khan ke vhaton shikast sey do char ho gae final mein bhi unhon ne bahot zaberdast khail ka mozahra keya megar un ke mamoon ne apne tajurbe sey faida uthate hue bazi jeet li
akhir kar british open title mohibullah ke hisse mein mein aya yeh sabit qadmi ki fatah thi unki mehnat rang lai aur qismat neb hi un ka khoob sath deya
woh ibtedai round ke matches mein behtareen kar kerdagi ka mozahra kerke final mein pahonche they
mein mohibullah ne apne bare mein apne mamoon hashim khan ko do bare tournament ke final mein shikast di pehle unhon ne us open jeeta aur phir candian open
mein mohibullah ko america mein koching ka moqa bhi mila boston mein qaim harrods club ne mohibullah khan ko professional coach moqarar kiya tha
many times he has elected president of the world squash federation
squash ki duniya key leyea bea taj badsha aur tareekh key behtareen khelari jahangir khan december key roze karachi mein paida huae
jahangir khan na squash ke maidan mein pakistan ka nam roshan kei
iss ke baad jhangir khan ke walid roshan khan aur bhai torsam khan kamyabian hasil kein te rahe
app ney pehli kamiabi september mein sal ki umer mein gair peasha wer khelaryon ki almi chapion ship jeet ker hasil ki

iss waqae ney jhangir khan ki nafsiat par ghara aser dala unhon ney shabana roz terbiat aur sakht mehnet ka silsila shuru ker dea aur apney kazen rehmat khan ki cotching mein aisey khelari baney key sirf sal ki umer mein unhon ney australia key jeef hfunt ko shikasht dea ker world open jeet lea
yahan sey jahangir khan ki kamyabeon key silseley ka agaz hua aur moselsel sal tek who na qabil e shishat rahtey huae kamyabeon par kamyabian hasil ker tey gae
unhon ney sarehy panch saw sey zaid moqablon mein mosalsel kamyabi hasil ker key aisa record qaiem kea jisey shaed aenda koi na tor sekey
mein jhangir khan ney aik point bhi beggar inter national squash plears asosi ashion ki champion ship jeet ker aik dunya ko warta hairet mein dal dea
yehan bhi jahangir khan ney apna loha manwaya aur tournaments mein sey mein kamyabi hasil ki
amrica key saf e aual key khaelari mark talboot sey iss dauran inn ka moqabla hua aur inn mein sey mertaba jahangir khan ney kabyabi hasil ki
ibtedai moqablon mein jahangir khan ko kamyabi hasil hue lakin bad azan jan sher khan ney mosalsel moqablon meinun key khelaf kamyabi hasil ki
jahangir khan key khelaf kamyabi ka iss sey behter record aur kisi khelari ka nahin
retired honey sey pehley unhon ney mosalsel bar yea ejaz hasil kea jo aik record hay
app ki kamyabeon key eteraf mein app ko sadarti temgha barae husn karkerdagi sey nawaza gea aur canada key aik adarey ney un ki zindagi par fatha nami aik film bhi taiyar ki
iss key elawa almi sitah par unhein bea shumar deegar azazat sey nawaza gea woh kae mertaba almi squash fedreation key sadar bhi muntakhib ho chukey hain
boom boom afridi mountains ke shehzade aur cricket ground mein sixers ka badshah
jarihana andaaz se khelne wale khiladi to duniya mein beshumar hain magar afridi ki baat he kuch aur hai
kuch log to yahan tak kehte hain ke cricket ki duniya ne in jaise mizaaj ka khiladi na dekha hai aur na shayad aaiynda dekh paaenge
in ke bare mein yeh kehna ke wo jarihana style ke all rounder hain
tahum inhe ab bhi one day international aur twenty twenty ka king kaha ja sakta hai
agar wo bating mein johar nahi dikha pae to balling mein jadogari dikha dete hain
isi liye shahid ko dunioya ke behtareen all rounder ki suff mein shamil kiya jata hai
shahid afridi aise batsman hain ke jo khelne ke liye ground mein aate hain to aik samaa band jata hai
cricketer shahid khan afridi us daur ki paidawar hain jab pakistan ne mein world cup jeeta tha aur har naujawan imran khan aur javed miandad ki tarah cricketer banna chahta tha
shahid ki aamad aik toofan sabit hui kyun ke nairobi ground par kenya ke khilaaf rd number par bating karte huie in naujawan ne balls par century bana kar aalmi record torh dala tha
yeh mehdood over ski tez tareen century thi jise dekhte hue cricket ke paristaron ki oper ki saans oper aur niche ki saans niche reh gai thi

filsm par mushtamil silsile ki pehli film ne maqboliyat ke tamam record torh diye aur zahir hai ke is ke sath he emma watson bhi raton raat famous ho gai
in ki khud aitemadi aur makalmon ki adaiygi bohat pasand ki gai
mein forbes magazine ne sab se ziyada qabil e qadar kam umer artists ki top of the list mein emma watson ko number par rakha
emma watson apni zaati zindagi apne doston aur press se alag rakhti hai
is ka naam abhi tak kisi celebrity ke sath nahi jorha ja saka hai
emma watson ne modeling ke maidan mein bhi qismat aazmai hai lekin filhaal wo aik american university mein apni taleem mukammal kar rahi hai
aik interview mein inho ne kaha tha mujhe shohrat nahi gumnami chahiye
abhi wo aam talba o talbaat ki tarah zindagi guzaarna chahti hai aur filhal inho ne acting tark kar di hai
apne career ke mustaqbil ka faisla wo taleem mukammal hone ke bad he karega
jinhe beyk waqt urdu aur punjabi films mein kamiyabi mili thi

aik mauseeqar gharane se talluq rakhne wale munir hussain ke sage mamo rasheed atrey pakistan ke azeem tareen mausiqar the jab ke in ke khala zaad bhai safdar hussain bhi aik aala paaey ke mausiqar sabit hue

munir hussain ko apni pehli he naghmati film saat lakh ke famous zamana sada bahaar geet qarar lautne wale to pyar ko tarsey ki recording ke liye in ke mamo rasheed atrey ne barhi tayyari karwai thi aur aaghaz he barha dhamaka khez sabit hua tha
jo is se qabal film heer aur ishq laila ke shahkar geeton ki wajah se suf awwal ke singer ban chuke the

yeh sureela geet bhi mamo bhanjey rasheed atrey aur munir hussain ki mushtarka peshkash thi
munir hussain saleem raza aur mehdi hassan ki tarha classical mauseeqi par aboor rakhte the

bollywood ke style icon shahrukh khan sirf naam ke hi king aur badshah nahi balke wo caroron madahon ke dilon par raj bhi karte hain
un ki muskurahat se le kar style statement tak har cheiz jese perfect hai aur dilchasp baat ye hai ke wo na sirf aik kamyab adakar hain balke aik kamyab producer aur mezban bhi hain

mini screen ke junior artist se le kar global icon banne tak unhon ne har shobe mein shuhrat aur kamyabi hasil ki chahe wo koi stage show ho ya film press conference ho ya kisi benul qawami university mein ki jane wali taqrir

shahrukh khan kisi bhi moqe par nazireen ko lutf indoz karne mein nakaam nahi howae aur agar in tamam baton ke elawa un ke style statement par nazar dali jaye to pata chalta hai ke wo bhi un ki tarah hi anokha hi hai

isi film ke secovil mein bhi angelina jolie ka kirdar bohat pasand kiya gaya
action filmon mein un ki mr and mrs smith wanted salt aur johnny depp ke muqable mein film tourist sab se ziyadah qabil e zikar hain
angelina jolie sirf aik kamyab adakara hi nahi balke insan dost shakhsiyat ki bhi malik hain
in ke falahi kaamon ki aur bosnia ki jangi qadiyon ke leye kaamon ki wajah se unhein united nations ke high commissioner baraye panah guzeen ne unhein apna khair sagali safeer muqarar kiya tha
angelina jolie ne iraq combodia aur afghan muhajreen ke leye bhi bohat kaam kiya aur un ki bahali ke leye record funds jama kiye
angelina jolie bar pakistan bhi aachuki hain pheli bar mein zalzala zadgan ki amdad ke leye jab ke dosri bar selab zadgan ki madad ke leye mein aai thein
is ke elawa angelina jolie ne duniya bhar ke qehat zadgan aftad ke leye bhi bohat kaam kiya
se wo siyasi satah par bhi america mein falahi kaamon mein sar garm hain
hollywood ki kai adakaraon ki tarah jolie li zaidagi mein bhi kai afrad se taluqat rahe hain
un ke bache hain jab ke unhon ne bache god bhi liye hain
angelina jolie ki zindagi ke kai phelo hain lekin unhein khas tor par insan dost adakar ke tor par jana jata hai

pakistan ki filmi sanat mein aur ki dehayon ko baja tour par waheed murad ka zamana qarar diya ja sakta hai ager chay iss dour mein santos darpan sudheer eajaz habib aur bad mein mohammed ali aur nadeem ne hi apni adakari ke jouhar dekhye lakin un mein se kio actor woh dastani hasiat ikhtiyar na ker saka jo waheed murad ko hasil hue
shayad iss liye ke waheed murad ki zati kahani aik mokammal aur kamyab almeay kay tamam anasir khud mein samoye huye hain

to kiya deegar hum asar actors ki zati zindagi mein koi dramai pehloo nahein thamohammed ali radio pakistan hyderabad pe mahaz aik sada kar they zina ba zina taraqi ki manzilein tay ker tey aur badey mokhalif ki tandi se mardana war moqabla ker te huye aik din intehai shan o shaukat se parda e semein par namudar huye kiya yeh aik daramai kahani nahein hainazir baig ko karachi lahore pindi kahein bhi radio ne ghas na dali aur unhein bharat par ker ke dhakey jana para jahan haftey mein aik adh bar radio par gazal ganey ka moqa mil jata tha lakin jab bharat kar ihtesham ki nazr e karam iss noujawan par pari to film chakori wajood mein aie aur wahi naujawan raton rat pakistan ka hero number wan ben geya jisey

ab ham nadeem key nam se jantey haien to keya nadeem ki dastan e hayat dilchasp nahein hayyaqinan yeh dono kahanyan jaddo jahad aur kamyabi ki azeem misalein haien jabkey waheed murad ko na to studio pahochney key leyeh kabhi bason aur rekshon mein dhakkey khaney parey aur na hi mangney key leyeh directron key der peyhazri deni pari woh to soney ka chamcha munh mein ley ker paida huey they aur apnay walid ki badaulat bees baras ki umer mein hi filmon key taqseem kar bun chukey they
baras ki umer mein woh chocolate hero ki shohrat ka maza cakh chukey they aur baras ki umer mein unhein pakistan ki pehli palatenium jubli ke kahani kar hero aur producer hone ka ajaz mil chukka tha

jo shaks zindagi ki sari kamyaban moqadder mein likhwaney ke bad iss duniya mein aya ho aur jisey shuhrat amm ki manzil tek pahonchney ke liyeh aik tinka na hilana paraho uski bazahir sedhi aur sapat zindagi mein awam ko kiya dilchspi ho sakti thilakin haqeeqat yeh hay key apnay maddahon ki jetni bari khaip waheed murad ne tayar ki woh pakistan key kisi hero ko naseeb nahein hue yeh wahid hero tha jiskey maddahon ne monazzim hoker fan club tashkeel deay aur ajj is ski mout key itney baras bad bhi yeh maddah uski yad mein ijtemat ker tey haien uski filmon key khasusi show muaqid karatey haien uski qaber par hazri detey haien aur uskey nam par film award jari ker tey haien

waheed murad key walid nisar murad karachi mein kamyab distri bauter they mein waheed murad ne karachi university se ma english kiya aur uskey bad walid key karobar mein purey tour par shareek hotey huay apni pehli film aulad ka agaz keya jis key director sm yousuf they aur adakaron mein nayar sultana aur darpen shamil they waheed murad nay iss film mein aik roll bhi ada keya lakin in ki adakari key asal jaouher tab khuley jab un key dost parvaiz malik amrica se film sazi ka diploma ley ker lautey aur unhon nay waheed murad ki film heera aur patther ki hedayat kari key faraiz sanbhal leyeh

iss film mein waheed murad nay aik gadah gari waley ka kirdar ada keya jo key zaiba ki mohabbat mein giraftar ho jata hay film ko zaberdast kamyabi hasil hue aur waheed murad ko key behtareen adakar ka nigar award hasil hua
film arman nay box office pe kamyabi key tamam guzashta record tor deay yeh pakistan ki pehli film thi iss ka geet akelay na jana aur ko ko korina gali gali gunaya janey laga

waheed murad kam mangney key leyeh apnay puraney doston key pas to nahein gaey lakin issi dauran unka purana pathan driver aur ghareloo mulazim badar monir pashto filmon ka maroof star ban chukka tha balkey apni filmein bhi prodece ker raha tha namak halal molazim nay puraney malik se wafadari ka mozahra ker tey huey usey apni pashto film pakhtun pa wilayat kamba mein kam deya jo waheed murad ne qabool ker leya

johnny depp ko baja taur par filmy duniya ka kamao poot qarar diya ja sakta hai wo na sirf films ki kamiyabi ki alamat samjhe jate hain bal ke khus bhi sab se ziyada muaawza lene wale artists ki suff mein shamil hain
johnny depp apne fankarana salahiyaton ke balbotey par ab tak golden globe aur screen actors guild award samait mutaddid aezazaat hasil kar chuke hain
shakhsi sehar ke lihaaz se bhi johnny depp kisi dosri celebrity se piche nahi
people magazine ne aur mein inhe purkashish tareen mard qarar diya tha
mein johnny depp ko maqbool tv show jump street mein kaam karne ka mauqa mila jis ke bad kamiyabiyon ke darwazey in par khulte he chale gaey
lorry ne he apne sabiq boy friend actor nicholas cage ke zariye johnny depp ko filmy duniya mein mutarrif karwaya tha
ustaad nusrat fateh ali khan ne apni tamam umar qawali ke fun ko seekhne aur use mashriqomaghrib mein maqbool aam banana mein sarf kar di
inho ne soofiyaekaram ke peyghamat ko duniya ke kone kone tak pohnchaya aur un ke faiz se khud unhe bepanah shohrat nasib hui
pakistan mein nusrat fateh ali khan ka pehla tarruf apne khandan ki riwayati rang mein gaai hui in ki ibtedai qawaliyon se hua

bad mein unho ne lok shaiyri aur apne hum asar shora ka kalam apne makhsoos andaaz mein ga kar mulk ke andar kamiyabi ke jhandey garhe aur us daur mein sun charkhe mithi mithi mithi kok mahi meyno yaad awanda aur sanson ki mala pe simron mein pee ka naam ne aam taur par qawwali se lagao na rakhne wale tabqey ko apni taraf raghib kiya aur yun nusrat fateh ali khan ka halqa asarowasee tar ho gaya
nusrat fateh ali khan sahi maeyno mein shohrat ki bulandiyon par us waqt pohnche jab peter gabriel ki mauseeqi mein gaai gai
lekin kehte hai nusrat fateh ali khan ne apne walid ki wafat ke din bad he unhe khuwab mein dekha jis mein unho ne nusrat ko gaeyki ki takeed ki
us waqt nusrat fateh ali khan ki umar baras thi aur yun bator qawwal wo dunyaemauseeqi mein mutarif hue
in ki shuru ke salon ki gaeyki tasawwuf ke peyghamat se bharpor rahi
shaiyri se le kar mauseeqi tak in ki qawwali ka har juz samaa ki mukhtalif mehfilon mein ja kar is rohani kefiyat se faiziyab hui

is barey mein bharat ke mashoor filmsaaz aur mauseeqar muzaffar ali kehte hain ke nusrat ki awaz dilon mein ghar kar jati thi mashriq ho ya maghrib hindustan ho ya pakistan in ki awaaz ne tamam sarhaden torh di thi

nusrat fateh ali khan ne qawwali mein jiddat la kar maghrib mein barhe peymane par is sanaf ko mutarif karwaya aur is ke sath sath maghrib ke naamwar mauseeqaron ke sath mil kar apne fun ka muzahira kiya

kya is se in ki asal sanaf par koi asar parha muzaffar ali ka kehna tha ke qawwali mein bajne wale tamam saaz aik rang ya mizaj mein dhale hote hain un par izafi saaz dalna zabardasti dosra libas pehnane ke mutaradif hai
in ke aik maghrabi maddah ne aik dafa kaha tha ke nusrat ki gaeyki ap ko dawat deti hai chupke se kaan laga kar is guftugo ko sunne ki jo aik bandey air us ke rab ke darmiyan hoti hai

apne rab ke huzoor nazrana pesh karne kea mal lekin nusrat ko sunte hue hum mehaz aik bande aur us ke rab ki guftugo anhi sunte bal ke un ki gaeyki ka asal jado he yeh hai ke hamare dil in ki gaeyki ke utar charao ke sath dharakne kagte hain
in ke gaeyki mein zam ho jate hain aur hum rab ke huzoor us nazrane ke hissa ban jate hain wo gaeyki mein rab se guftugo karte hain aur humen bhi apne rab se hum kalam kar dete hain
speilberg abhi teen ager he the ke inho ne apne doston ke sath mil kar aik mm adventure movie shauqiya taur par banai thi
mein wo scout boy ban gae aur us dauran minute ki mm the last gun fight bana kar photography merit badge hasil kiya
inho ne scout master se pocha ke agar wo yeh kaam apne walid ki movie camera se kar len to kaisa rahega inhe ijazat mil gai ghaliban yehi in ki direction ke career ka nuqta aaghaz the
baras ki umer mein spielberg ne wartonowear naami minute ki film bana kar apna pehla award jeeta
baras ki umer mein inho ne apni pehli minute ki science fiction film fire light ki kahani likhi aur is ki direction bhi ki
jise maqami cinema mein numaiysh ke liye pesh kiya gaya aur is se dollar ka munafa hasil hua
isi kamiyabi se mutassir ho kar steven spielberg ne film close encounter banai jis ne box office par acha business kiya
graduation karne ke sath he inho ne eagle scout ka rank bhi hasil kar liya
apne bachpan ke barey mein in ka kehna hai ke wo awail umer he se pukhta mazhabi aqaiyd rakhte the
usi waqt tak in ka kaam mehaz shauqia samjha ja raha tha
yeh pehli baqaida commercial film thi jis ki kahani bhi inho ne khud he likhi thi
yeh film box office par super hit sabit hui aur inhe pehli bar behtareen director ke academy award ke liye nominate kiya gaya
is ke bad spielberg ne pehli jang e azeem par banne wali film ki direction ki
yeh film bhi blockbuster sabit hui aur yun spielberg ne kamiyabi ki shahrah par aise safar ka aaghaz kiya
jo tahaal pori raftaar ke sath jari hai
ibtedai daur mein spielberg ne apne walid ki jangi kahaniyon se mutassir ho kar dosri aalamgeer jang ke hawale se bhi kae films banai
jis ki kamiyabi ke bad inhe science fiction films ka mustanid director samjha jane laga
tahum inho ne khud ko sirf science fiction films tak he mehdood nahi rakha bal ke har mauzoo par filmy stories likhin direction ki aur kuch films produce bhi ki
steven spielberg samaji o falahi sargarmiyon mein bhi barh charh kar hissa lete hain
jinhe bilamoom saraha jata hai
in mein se beshtar bpx office par kamiyab rahi hain
jo misaal ke taur par shark fishes ya dinosaurs ke muqabley mein kahi ziyada sanjeeda mauzoaat ka aahata karti hain
hum baaz auqaat aam dagar se hat kar apni nakamiyon se bhi waisi he mohabbat kar sakte hain jaisi ke kamiyabiyon se karte hain
is liye ke hum kamiyabi ke muqabley mein apni nakaami se kahi ziyada sabaq seekh sakte hain
mujhe paisa banane se nahi films banane se dilchaspi hai
aap behtareen kaam kijiye paisa khud chal kar aap ke paas aaega
is ke piche in ki barson ki mehnat aur gher mamooli salahiyatein hain
inho ne bilashuba apne mulk ki filmy history par gehre naqoosh murattab kiye hain aur in ke zikar ke bagher yeh tareekh mukammal nahi ho sakti
khud shahrukh khan ka is silsile mein yeh kehna hai ke major general shahnawaz in ke walid ke azeez the
wo batate hain ke in ke waldain ki mulaqat khasey filmy andaaz mein hui thi
walid sahib ne inhe na sirf hospital pohanchaya tha bal ke in ki jaan bachane ke liye khoon bhi diya tha
is accident ke badaulat hone wali shanasaai ka natija shadi ki soorat mein nikla
walid se in ki qurbat aur wabistagi bohat gehri thi
in ke inteqal ke sadmey ki shiddat apni jagah thi lekin isi saneha ki badaulat unho ne apne balbotey par zindagi guzaarne ka hunar seekh liya
jis mein wo khasey kamiyab rahe
jis ke tehat wo kae kamiyab films bana chuke hain
shahrukh khan falahi kamon aur imdadi sargarmiyon mein bhi hissa lete hain
khas taur par hospitals ko shahrukh khan bhari donations dete hain
shahrukh khan sirf apne mulk mein he nahi bal ke bohar se deegar mumalik mein bhi bohat maqbool hain aur india mein box office par inhe number one samjha jata hai
shahrukh khan ki kamiyab tareen films ke naam yeh hain
inhe bachpan se he singing ka shauq tha
is awaaz ki kashish inhe kasha kasha sath wale ghar le gai jahan bachiyan apne ustaad se gana seekh rahi thin
kamsin iqbal bano chup ke se jaa kar is class mein beth gai aur ustaad ki awaaz ke sath awaaz milana shuru kar di
ustaad kehen lage yeh ladki agar singing seekh le to bohat acha gaegi
tab iqbal bano ke shauq ko ustaad ki raae ne jilaa bakhshi aur inho ne apne aehal e khana se kaha mujhe gana seekhna hai

aehal e khana ne jab yeh dekha ke iqbal bano ke is shauq ki wajah se in ki parhai mutassir ho rahi hai to inhe singing ki mashroot ijazat dete hue radio station par bachon ke program mein le jaya gaya
jab khandaan iqbal bano ke shauq ki raah mein mazeed rukawat na bana aur inho ne ustaad chand khan se classical singing ki baqaida tarbiyat leni shuru ki
dono ustadon se thumri aur daadra samait classical singing ki barikiyon se aagahi hasil ki
yehi wajah hai ke iqbal bano ke gaae hue geeton aur ghazlon mein classical rang numayan nazar aata hai
inqelabaat zamana ne iqbal bano ki awaaz ko kabhi mutassir nahi kiya bal ke mazeed nikhaar diya tha
wo apni zindagi ke aakhri saal tak gaati rahin aur daad samait ti rahin
taqseem hind ke kuch arsey bad wo shadi kar ke pakistan aa gai aur phir yahan inho ne radio film aur tv ke liye apni awaaz ka jadoo jagaya
jab film walon ne iqbal bano ki classical awaaz suni to in se rujoo kiya aur film ke liye gaane ki baqaida dawat di
tab aik sadabahar geet ne janam liya
tu laakh chale ri gori tham tham k film gumnaam ke is geet ke bad aik aur maqbool tareen geet iqbal bano ki awaaz se jawidaan hua
ulfat kin ae manzil ko chala tu bahein daal ke baahon mein anwar kamal pasha ki in dono films ki kamiyabi mein iqbal bano ki awaaz ka bohat dakhal tha
is ke bad iqbal bano ke pas films ki line lag gai lekin inho ne sirf muntakhib geet gaane ko tarjeeh di
isi liye inho ne films mein kam gaya lekin khob gaya
iqbal bano ne film ke liye kae khobsurat aur yaadgar naghme gaae
jin ka shumar sadabahar geeton mein hota hai
film ishq laila ke geeton ne to har taraf dhoom macha di thi
is film ke liye iqbal bano ne mausiqar safdar hussain ka compose kiya hua yaadgar geet gaya
sitaron tum to sou jao paresha an raat sari hai sapaid rangat aur dilkash naqosh ki malik iqbal bano ka ghazal aur thumri gaane ka apna khas andaaz tha jo inhe deegar gaane walon se mumtaz karta tha
rasio par iqbal bano ne usatza ki ghazlen gaane ko tarjeeh di
yun to iqbal bano ne barhe barhe shoara ka kalaam gaya magar mayanaz poet faiz ahmed faiz ki nazmon aur ghazlon ko inho ne is kamaal maharat ke sath gaya ke sunne walon par sehar taari ho jata tha
faiz ki is famous nazam ko iqbal bano ne khud he compose kiya aur itne khobsurat o dilkash andaaz mein gaya ke in ke naam ko zinda rakhne ke liye yehi kafi hai
dasht e tanhai mein ae jaan e jahan larza an hain teri aaghosh ke saaey tere honton ke saraab phir faiz ahmed faiz ki aik aur maqbool aam nazam

hum dekhenge lazim hai ke hum bhi dekhenge jab takht giraae jaenge jab taaj uchale jaenge in nazmon ko apni khobsurat aur munfarid awaaz mein gaa kar iqbal bano ne amar kar diya aur khud bhi amar ho gai
daagh dil hum ko yaad aane lage log apne diye jalane lage is ko iqbal bano ne itne dilkash andaaz mein gaya ke is mein chaar chand laga diye
iqbal bano ka aik yaadgar musical concert jaipur mein hua tha jab wo saarc ke tehat saqafti wafood ke tabadley ke hawale se pehli baar india gai thin
jaipur mein bohat barha auditorium tha october ka month tha sardi thin a garmi barha acha mausam tha
ab ke saawan ghar aa ja mera gana jari tha ke achanak barish ki boondein parhna shuru ho gai
mujhe aisa laga ke jaise moti tapak rahe hain
isi asnaa mein announcer ki awaaz sunai di jo keh raha tha ke pehle suna he suna tha lekin aaj hum dekh rahe hain ke meghraj mein iqbal bano thumri gaa rahi thin ke barish ho gai
iqbal bano ko classical aur neem classical bilkhusoos mere watan ke naujawan watan ke geet gaae jaa aur yeh apni zameen yeh apna watan sooraj ki tarah roshan roshan apni misaal aap hain
agar sawal kiya jae ke pakistan ke kisi fankaar ka naam batae jise radio television aur film ke hawale se aalmi shohrat hasil hai to jawab mein hamare paas sirf aik naam hai aur wo hai zia mohyeddin
theater ki mohabbat inhe kusha kusha london le gai jahan inho ne mein royal academy of dramatic arts mein drama ki baqaida tarbiyat hasil ki aur stage dramas ka aaghaz kiya
zia mohyeddin se meri dosti barson par muheet hai
