nasir iqbal is waqat pakistan ke un chand khilariyon mein se aik hain jin se mustaqbil mein achi umeeden wabasta hain
wo pakistan squash ki tarikh ke wahid khilari hain jinein british open junior ki under championship jetne ka ezaz hasil hai
wo duniya squash mein junior satah ke kai muqabalon ke title apne naam kar chuke hain
st april ko bannu mein paida hone wale pakistan number one nasir iqbal apne khandan ke wahid fard hain jo benul qawami satah par pakistan ki numaindagi kar rahe hain
unhein england mein hone wale london open aur malaysia mein hone wale royal cup ka title jeetne ka ezaz bhi hasil hai
duniya e squash mein ke ikhtetam par un ki world ranking thi tahum nasir iqbal ke azam buland hain aur bohat jald dunya ke top ten khilariyon mein shamil hone ke leye pori mehnat kar rahe hain

bas usse dekh kar mera shoq barha aur main is tarah aaga aur teen saal ki practice aur training ke bad main ne british junior mein shirkat ki aur under championship jeetne mai kaamyab raha
is tournament mein kaamyabi se mere leye squash kheelne ki rahein khulti gayein phir bad mein na sirf pakistan balke beron e mulk mein bhi junior title jeetne mein kaamyab raha hun

iss leye waqti tour per bhutto ko mana lea gia aur qoumi assembly mein unsay allanetasqand ki hamayat bhi kerwai gai tahum june mein achanak unka istafa manzoor ker kay unhain farig ker dia gai

bila shuba iss waqt bhuto kay istafay say pori qaum ko sadma hua aur na sirf ayub khan ki amriyat bai naqab hui balkay awam kay jazbat ayub khan kay sakht khelaf aur bhutto ko mazloom qarar day ker un kay haq mein ho gaye chunanchay jab bhutto larkana jatay huye lahore railway station say guzray to un kay maddahon naray ki aik kasir tadad station per moujood thi

rajiv gandhi bomb blast ke natije mein chal base

is accident ne sonia gandhi ko bharat ki pur tashaddud politics se mutanfir kar diya aur inho ne congress ki janib se rajiv gandhi ki jaan nasheen banne ke liye dale jane wale dabao ki saliha saal tak mazahmat ki

wo nahi chahti thi ke in ke dono bachon rahul gandhi aur priyanka gandhi par khoon e siyasat ka manhoos saya bhi parhe lekin bil aakhir mein inhe party ke mustaqil dabao ke saamne himmat dikhani parhi aur wo congress ki intekhabi mohim mein hissa lene par aamada ho gai

sonia gandhi bharat ki pehli roman catholic prime minister ban sakti thin agar wo mein congress ki hairan kun intekhabi kamiyabi ke bad wazarat e uzmaa ka auhda qabool karne se inkaar kar ke sab he ko hairan na kar deti
congress ka dabao tha ke wo yeh mansab zaroor sambhalen lekin inho ne yeh kehte hue inkaar kar diya ke mere andar ki awaaz mujhe yeh auhda sambhalne se roak rahi hai
mein sonia gandhi parliament ki rukniyat se bhi mustaafi ho gai kyun ke mukhalfeen ne yeh mauqqif ikhteyar kiya tha ke wo national advisory council ki sarbarah bhi hain
is liye aaiyn ki roah se munfaat bakhsh auhdey apne paas nahi rakh sakti

agarcha council ke sarbarah ko koi tankhuwa adaa nahi ki jati is liye use muna fat bakhsh sarkari auhda qaraar nahi diya ja sakta lekin sonia gandhi ne khud ko tanazey se bachane ke liye parliament ki rukniyat aur council ki sarbarahi dono se he istefaa de diya

usi dauran par control tower se peygham mila ke tayyarey ko kidnap hone se bachaya jae

mein iss kay tashkeeli dour mein karachi mein lasani fsadat ka aagaz hua to mqm aik bari siasi jamat ki haisiat say samnay aie in fasadat nay altaf hussain ki shohrat aur badnami donon mein azafa kiya

amir khan kuch arsa pehlay janab altaf hussain aur unki jamaat muttahida qaumi movement say apni ghalti ki maafi mang kar muttahida mein shamil hogaye hain
youn altaf zardari bhai bahi ka nara samnay aya
altaf hussain aaj bhi london mein moqeem hain aur wahan party ke international secretariat se party ke muamalat chala rahay hain
altaf hussain par bohot say ilazmat lagaye gai hain
unhain dahshatgard aur qatil tak kaha gaya hai
tamam hukumaton ki taraf say unhain aik mujrim sabit karnay ki koshish ki gaie hai

naserullah babar imran khan aur zulfikhar mirza jaisay logon nay britannia jakar bhi unkay khalaf qanuni karwai kar nay ka alan kia lakin iss sab kay bawajud woh apni jagah par qaim aur mustehkam hain
altaf hussain ki maqbuliat mein har guzartay din kay sath azafa hi hua koi kami nahi aie aur na unkay mokhalif apnay tamam tar dawon kay bawajud unhain hilanay mein nakam rahay
altaf hussain pakistan say bahar honay kay bawajod pakistani siasat mein aik aham markaz ki haisiat rakhtay hain aur unki taqarer aur bayanat hamashah amokhas ki tawajjah hasil kartay rahay hain

pakistan mein nro kay silsilay mein jo shuro galga utha woh isi waqt thamnay mein aya jab janab altaf hussain nay nro ki mokhalfat kartay huye sadarepakistan janab asif ali zardari ko mashwarah dia kay woh doston ki baat manain aur agar pakistan mein istehkam lanay kay silsilay mein unhain koi qurbani bhi daina paray to woh us say draig na karain
altaf hussain ki taraf say do tok alfaz samnay anay par aik dam sab kuch thanda par gaya aur wazeereazam ki taraf say nro ko manzuri kay leye parliament mein pass na kar nay ka alan kar dia gaya

altaf hussain ka ye musbat faisla jahan unki sakhsiyat ko mazeed mustehkam kar nay ka bais bana wahein iss say ye bhi zahir hua kay pakistan mein na rehnay kay bawajud unki baton mein katna wazan aur ahmiyat rakhti hai
th july ko zia ul haq nay pakistan mein martial law lagadia jis ki waja say zulfiqar ali butto ko takhtadar ka moun dakhna para aur benazir bhutto ko harasat mein lalia gaya
say tak ka arsa benazir bhutto nay mukhtalif jaloon mein qeaidoband ki sobatain jhaltay mukhtalif muqamaat per nazar band rehkar guzara
iss doraan inhun nay mah ki qeaidetanhaye bhe kati
mein reha honay kay baad woh khud sakhta jila watni kay tehat saal kay lia england chali gayein
august mein woh apnay bhi shanawaz bhutto ki tadfeen kay lia watan lotein jissay france kay sahar canes mein zahar day kar halaq kardia gaya tha
december ko inn ki shadi asif ali zardari say hoye
kay intekhabat mein iji nay akasariyat hasil ki aur nawaz sharif wazeereazam pakistan banay
march ko mulki halaat kay pesh nazar nawaz sharif nay apnay sathiyon samat wazarateuzma say istafa day dia aur sadar ghulam ishaq khan nay assembly tehleel kardi

inn sab kay bawajud halat ki kashidgi barqarar rahi aur yeh kashedgi us waqt uroj per pahonch gaie jab benazir kay chotay bhai mir murtaza bhutto ko unki apni bahan kay ahde hukumat mein aik intahaye masqooq police maqblay mein sath sathiyon samat halaq kardia gaya
murtaza bhutto ki halaqat ko sarkari qatal qarar deya geya aur asif ali zardari ko iska zemma dar tehraya gaya
november mein sadar farooq ahmed leghari nay mukhtalif ilzamat kay tayhat benazir bhutto ko unkay uhday say mazol kar deya aur assemblyan tor dein
benazir bhutto per mukhtalif moqadmat qaym kar kay adalti karwai ki gae laykin issi dauran woh mulk say bahar chali gayein aur khud sakhtah jila watni ikhtyar kar li
moqadmat chaltay rahay aur asif ali zardari ko sal say zaid arsay ki qeid bhugatni pari

benazir bhutto aur meesaqe jamhuraitnawaz sharif jab pervez musharraf ki karwai kay shikar hokar jila watan honay per majbor huye to iss tajurbay nay unhain aur benazir bhutto ko bhi bahot kuch sochnay par majbur kar deya
ard nay general pervez musharraf ki hukumat kay khelaf bhar pur mazahmat ka alan keya

jab may mein london mein nawaz sharif aur benazir kay darmayan meesaqe jamhurait par dastakhat huya jis kay tayhat donon nay jamhuryat ko bahal karnay aur aik dosray kay khaylaf istaymal na honay ka faisla keya

dosri pesh qadmi iss waqt huie jab july ko abu dhabi mein general pervez musharaf aur benazir bhutto kay darmeyan aik aham mulaqat huie jis kay baad peoples party ki chairperson taqriban sarah saal ki jila watni khatam kar kay october ko watan wapis ayein to unka karachi airport par faqedul misal istaqbal keya gaya
benazir bhutto ka karwan sharaefaisal par mazar quaid ki janib barh raha tha kay achanak zordar dhamakay huye
inn dhamakon mein paunay do sau kay lag bhag afrad jan bahaq huye aur sankron zakhmi hoye
qiamat e sughra kay iss manzar kay dauran benazir bhutto ko bahefazat bilawal house paucha deya gaya peoples party ki chairperson jab apnay bachchon bilawal bakhtawar aur asifa say milnay
dobarahdubai gayein to mulk kay andar general parvez musharraf nay november ko emergency nafiz kar di
iss surat hal mein peoples party nay maidan khali na chornay ki hikmat amli kay tayhat tamam halqon mein umedwar kharay keye aur kaghzatenamzadgi jama karay

agar chay ard kay faislay kay tahat nawaz sharif nay bhi intekhabat mein hissah na lanay ka faisla keya tha lakin benazir bhutto nay unhain qayel keya kay herkaron ko khuli chott na de jaye aur halat khwa kaisay bhi hon intekhabat mein hissah zarur leya jaye

intekhabat mein chalaie janay wali mohim kay dauran december ko benazir bhutto liaqat bagh rawalpindi say aik jalsay amm say khitab kar kay bahar nikal rahi thein kay unki gari par fairing huie aur uskay sath hi aik falak sagaf dhamaka hua
benazir bhutto jo us waqt awam kay purjosh naron ka jawab daynay kay leye gari kay hawadan say bahar nikli khari thien buri tarha zakhmi huien aur thori hi dair mein khaliqehaqiqi say jamilien
khuch arsay baad nawaz sharif punjab kay sobai council ka hissa rehnay kay baad mein punjab kid sobia kabina mein bator wazeerekhazana huya
kay amm intaykahbat general election mein mian nawaz sharif qaumi aur subai assembly ki seaton pay bhari aksaryat say kamyab huye
april ko nawaz sharif nay panjab kay wazirealla ki hasyat say halaf uthaya

iss kay sath sath mohtarma benazir bhutto ki hukumat kay sath sath unki ikhtilafat bhi chalti rahi unhon nay mohtarmah benazir bhutto kay khaylaf tahrek adam ataymad mein barh carh kar hissa leya lakin kamyabi hasil na kar sakay
markaz aur suba punjab kay darmyan kashidgi ki fiza baqarar rahi ta waqat kay august kay roze sadar ghulam ishhaq khan nay benazir buttu kid hukumat khatam kar deya
iss ithad nay intaykhabat mein numayan aksaryat say kamyabi hasil ki aur november kay roze nawaz sharif ko palimony leader chun leya geya
november ko nawaz sharif nay wazeereazam ki haisiyat say halaf uthaya
app nay pehlay daur hukumat mein kaye aham aqdamat keye lakin iskay sath sath peoples party kay sath sath kashedgi ka silsila jari raha
mulk ki saisi surathal tahal puri tarah bahal nahein hui thi iss par hukumat aur aik bari siasi jamat ki mahaz arai nay jalti par tail ka kaam keya

benazir bhutto ki tarah nawaz sharif bhi panch saal puray nahi kar sakay aur president ghulam ishaq khan nay unki hukumat ko bhi taqriban unhi ilzamat kay taihat rukhsat kar deya jo pehlay benazir bhutto ki hukumat per lagaya gaya thay

agar chay mulk ki adalateuzma nay aik ayni muqadmay kay baad unhain dobarah un kay uhday pay bahal to kar deya lakin phir bhi july mein sadar ghulam ishaq khan kay sath mian nawaz sharif ko bhi apnay uhday say istayfa dayna para
unkay daure hukumat mein nawaz sharif datkar unki mukhalfat kartay rahay
nawaz sharif nay june ko qaumi assembly mein mehran bank scandal mein sadar pakistan kay maluwis honay kay sabot faraham keye

june ko bujat par bahas kartay huyae kaha kay bajat masakh shudah haqayaq ka majmua hay july ko aik baray jalsa e amm say khaytab kartay huay kaha kay ajj mulk ko tornay walon ki aulad aqtaydar mein hay

mujhay aqtaydar milay na milay unhain jana hoga unhon nay benazir hukumat kay khatmah kay leyeh tahryk najat ka alan keyah november ko parlimant kay mushtarkah ijlas mein apozishan ki janib say zabardast ahtayjaj hua aur sadar kay khaytab ka mokammal tour par batkat keya geya

november ko sadar farooq ahmad khan leghri nay benazir hukumat ka khatma kar deya aur february mein election kar waye un election mein mian nawaz sharif ko zabardast kamyabi huie aur woh dobarah wazireazam bangaye kay intakhabat kay baad mulki ki tareekh mein pahli martabah koi wazire azam atna bhari mended lay kar aqtaydar mein ayaiss matabah wazireazam bantay hi nawaz sharif nay athwein tarmem ka khatma kar deya jis kay tayhat koi sadar hukumat ko khatam kar nay ka akhtayar rakhta tha

mulki satah par unhon nay qarz utaro mulk sanwaro ki iskeem kay tayhat awam say paisay lay kar mulki qarzay utarnay ki mohim shuru ki jo agarchay kamyabi say hamkinar na hosaki lakin awami yaqjehti ka aik mazhar ban kar samnay aye

nawaz sharif dour mein bhi establishment kay sath nawaz sharif ki khan cha tani ka silsila jari raha pehlay chief justice supreme court sajjad ali shah say mian nawaz sharif kay akhtalafat huye jis mein unhain kafi kamyabi rahi iskay baad fouj kay sar barah general jahangir karamat ko unhon nay rukhsat keya

inn kamyabiyon nay unkay ataymad ko barah deya aur unhon nay pak fouj kay dosray sarbarah general pervaiz musharraf ko bhi chand ikhtilafat ki bina par bar taraf kar na chaha lakin iss martaba unhain kamyabi hasil na hosaki
general pervaiz musharraf ki sarbarahi mein unkay khaylaf fouji bagawat huie aur fouj ka kirdar qaumi sayasat mein kam kar nay ki yeh dyanat daranah koshish unkay leyeh afat ban gaie
october ko fouj ki taraf say nawaz hukumat khatam honay kay bad nawaz sharif par moqadma chala jo tayara shazish case kay nam say mashoor huya
iss mein agwa aur aqdameqatal kay ilzamat shamil thay
pervez musharraf kay sath aik khufia mohaiday kay baad nawaz sharif saudi arab chlay gaye

aik arsa tak nawaz sharif jaddah mein moqem rahay iss kay bad mulk mein jamhuryat ki bahali kay leye unhon nay mohtarma benazir bhutto kay sath milkar koshishon ka agaz keyah aur meshaq jamhuryat ki shakal mein aik tarykhi dasta wyz samnay layeh

august ko adalat nay sharif khandan ki darkhast par fayslah sunatay huay unki watan wapsi par hukumty aytayrazat rad kartay huyae puray khandan ko watan wapsi ki ayjazat daydi iss say pahlay nawaz sharif ki watan wapsi ki aik koshish nakamy say hamkinar hochuki thie bahar hal iss martabah unhain apnay maqsad mein kamyabi hasil huie aur november ko woh apnay khandan kay himrah lahore pahonch gayae
nawaz sharif nay un intaykahbat mein bazat e khud hissah nahi leya magar aik aham quait kay tour par seyasi manzer namay par moujud rahay

wukla tehreek kay daouran mazole chief justice iftekhar muhammad chaudhry ki bahali kay leye nawaz sharif nay bhar pur balkay kalidi kirdar ada keya iss kay alawa nro jaisay badnam zamana qanun ko parliament say manzoor nahi karwanay kay silsilay mein bhi mian sahab ka kirdar sab say zayadah ahmeyat kay hamil raha
iss waqt woh go mulk ki sarbarahi kay uhday par fayz nahin lakin agar ahmyat kay aitabar say daikha jaye to nawaz shareef ko pakistani sayasat ki sab say aham saksiyat qarar deya jasakta hai
in ki private zindagi ke is kamzor pehlon ki tasdeeq marcus mabry ne bhi ki hai

condoleezza rice auhd o shabaab mein aik naujawan american footballer rick upchurch se raah o rasam rakhti thin lekin aik arsey tak saath rehne ke bad inhe yeh bataya gaya ke mazkoora naujawan se in ki shadi kamiyab nahi hogi chunache inho ne is se laa talluqi ikhteyar kar ke shadi na karne ka faisla kar liya par wo taa haal qaiym hai

baras ki umar mein jab inho ne apne barey mein khud faisle karne shuru kiye to inho ne is haqiqat ka bhi saamna kiya ke musalsal koshishon ke bawajood wo piano bajane mein itni maharat hasil nahi kar sakin ke inhe professional pianist qarar diya ja sake chunache pianist banne ka khayal dil se nikaal kar inho ne shobaa siyasiyat ka rukh kar liya
tahum bad mein barhe paimane par tabahi phelane wale hathiyar baraamad na hone par condoleezza rice ko zabardast tanqeed ka saamna karna parha

condoleezza rice par is hawale se bhi tanqeed ki jati hai ke inho ne he america ke khilaaf sargarmiyon mein mulawwis alqaida ke arkaan ke khilaaf water boarding jaise azziyat rasani ke jadeed aur mohlik tariqe istemal karne ki tajveez bush administration se manzoor karai thi

condoleezza rice ke khayalat ke tanazur mein in ka shumar america ke qadamat pasand aur riwayaat pasand logon mein kiya ja sakta hai maslan george bush ki sadarti mohim ke dauran wo aelania kaha karti thi ke isqaat hamal par pabandi aaiyd honi chahiye
rice ne isqaat hamal ke khilaaf mohim chalane wale logon aur tanzeemon ko fund dene ki himayat karte hue kaha tha
condoleezza rice ko awaiyl umer mein apni siyah rangat ke baiys nasli imtiaz ke waqeyaat ka bhi saamna karna parha tha
inhe hotel mein kam darjey ka kamra diya jata
departmental stores mein goron ko fauqiyat di jati aur restaurant mein inhe qadrey veeraan nashiston par khana khana parhta tha
aur mein inhe duniya ki sab se taqatwar khatoon qarar diya gaya jab ke mein inhe mazkora list mein germany ki chancellor angela marker ke bad dosre number par rakha gaya
hindu se shadi hona bohat mushkil amar tha
mein india chor do quit india tehreek ke dauran bhi wo gandhi ji ke sath giraftar hue aur month ki jail kaati
allama ne wahin taleem paai aur apni siyasi zindagi ka aaghaz khilafat committee mein shamoliyat se kiya aur isi silsile mein jail bhi gaey
alipur jail mein in ki mulaqat calcutta corporation ke us waqt ke meyar mohammed usman se hui
halan ke mohammed ali jinnah aur mohammed ali jauhar mein siyasi ikhtelafat bhi qaiym rahe
bad azaa isi shehar mein november ko inteqal kar gaey

shahbaz sharif ko party ki qayadat sounphney ka faisla say pata chalta hai muslim leage ko sharif naam ki kashish par kitna yaqeen tha kay is be basi kay alam mein bhi inhein apni qayadat kay liye koi aur naam mouzo malom na huwa
may ko shahbaz sharif nay pakistan wapas aney ki koshish ki magar lahore kay alama iqbal bain ul aqwami hawai adde alama iqbal international airport say unhein wapas bhej diya gaya

august ko mian shahbaz sharif ko dobara agli muddat kay liye chuna gaya nawaz shrif kay mutabiq pakistani hukumat nay inhein apne bhai nawaz shahrif say mutanafir karne ki koshish bhi ki magar na kami hoi shahbaz sharif kay mutabiq woh nawaz sharif ko apne walid ki jaga samjhte hain

march na ahali kay case mein faisla in kay khalaf aney par shahbaz sharif ko kuch arsa kay liye iqtedar say alag bhi hona para lakin bad aza ye faisla khatam kardiya gaya aur woh aik bar phir suba punjab ki halat sudharne kay mission mein jet gaye in kay halqaeahbab mein shamil afrad ka kehna hai kay shahbaz sharif is kam kay liye itni mehnat kar rahay hain kay in ki apni sahat kharab ho rahi hai
quaid e azam ko bhi chundrigar ki shakhsiyat par mukammal aitemad ibrahim ismail chundrigar ne september ko karachi mein wafaat paai
garmiyon ki chutiyon ke liyeh waten wapas aye to taleem adhori chor di
abhi shamuliyat ikhteyar na ki thi ke unhon ne aik roze apney dost ko alla angrez officer se jhar partey dekhi iss per angrez ki nokri se nafrat ho gaye

khan abdul ghaffar khan bacha khan ke barey bhai abdul jabbar khan doctor khan englishtan mein thay unhon ney abdul ghaffar khan ko waheen bolaya lakin walid sahib ney janey na deya keonkey doctor khan sahib ne waheen molazmat ikhteyar ker ke aik angrez khatoon se shadi ker li thi aur un walda ka kheyal tha ke bara beta to hat se geya ab chota beta bhi waheen jaker kisi angrez larki se shadi karey ga aur waheen ka ho rahey ga
iss tarah bacha khan taleem ke liyeh baher na jasake

mein ghazi amanullah khan ke khelaf afghanistan mein sorish huye to khan abdul ghaffar khan bacha khan aik wafd ke sath amanullah khan se mulaqat ke liye balochistan ke raste kandahar ja rahe thay ke unhein sibbi mein griftar kar liya gaya

mein sarhad mein angrezon ke khelaf azadi ka ahang intehai taiz ho gaya qissa khawani bazar mein firing huye hazaron ki tadad mein pakhtoon shaheed kiye gaye khan abdul ghaffar khan bacha khan ko atmanjai se peshawar atey huye griftar ker liya geya aur agley saalon mein abdul ghaffar khan sirf chand mah jail aur nazar bandiyon se azad reh sake
iss tehreek ki kamyabi par inhein aur sathiyon ko kai bar tashadud ka nishana banaya gaya aur paband slasal kiya gaya
mein app jail se chutey to issi baras phir mount marlow islahat ke khelaf tahreek chalane ke jurm mein pandrah hazar razakaron samait griftar huye
mein rahai pai to un ka punjab aur sarhad mein dakhla mamnun qarar diya
iss ke baad azadi ki jaddojehad mein congress ke sath rahe
mein hindustan chor do ki tahreek mein lathi charj ka shikar hoker app ki do paslian toot gayein
zakhmi halat mein app ko qaid mein dal diya gaya
mein karachi mein peoples party ki bunyad bacha khan ne rakhi lakin iss se pashter ke iss nauzaidah jamat ka dhancah khara hota june mein griftar ker liye gaye
january mein reha keye gaye to soba sarhad mein dakhla aur naqlo harkat ki azadi na thi
lakin one unit bana aur phir khan abdul ghaffar khan aur doctor khan sahib ke raste juda hogaye
june mein apney bhai doctor khan sahab hi ki wazarat aala ke zamane mein griftar ker liye gaye
baghawat aur inteshar phelane ilzam mein moqadmat qaim huay
january mein rahai pai to national awami party banai october mein mashalla nafiz hua to masaibka key daur ka agaz hua
aur ka darmeyani arsa khan abdul ghaffar khan ney jailon aur jila watni mein guzara
dekha jaye to unki pori zindagi hi jail ke chakker katte huye guzer gae
se tak koi ais arsa na tha jab app mosalsal teen saalon tak jail se bahar rahe hon
khan abdul ghaffar khan ne national congress ki hamnawai mein do qaumi nazere musalmanon ke judagana tashkhus aur qiyam pakistan ko kabhi tasleem nahein kiya
qiyam pakistan ke sath hi pakhtunistan ke daye ho gae
mein kabul chale gaye wahan se al india radio kabul per apni taqreron zareye se pakistan ki mokhalfat aur pakhtunistan qaim ki tahreek chalai
jab russian afwaj ne afghanistan per hamla kiya to unhon ne afghan mojahideen ki bhi hemayat nahein ki

agarchay khan abdul ghaffar khan zindagi phar apne pakistani hone se inkari rahey aur pakistan ko aik ghulam reyasat qarar detey rahey yahi waja hai key unhon ney dafan hone ke leye afghanistan ki azad sarzamine ka intekhab kiya iss hawale se unhein iss kitab mein shamil nahein kiya jana chahiye tha

may mein momin shahi key halqa se qaumi assembly key rukun chuney gae june ki hizb e ikhtelaf key leader muntakhib huae september ko pakistan democratic party ke leader baney march ko sadar yahya khan ne sheikh mujibur rahman ko jo ke awami league ka sarbarah thay mashriqi pakistan mein qaumi assembly ki nishashton seats mein se nishashtain seats hasil ki thin ghair ioni qarar de dia aur sheikh mujibur rahman ko griftararrest kar liya iss waja se yeh hamaray azli dushman bharat se ja mila
yani bharti afwaj ko sheikh mujibur rahman ki hami mosllah tanzeem mukti bahini ka mokammal tawun hasil tha
april ko all india radio ne khaber nashar ki ke mashriqi pakistan mein azad hukumat ke qayam ka alan kar diya gaya hai
bharat ko ruse aur bartania ki mukammal hamayat aur madad hasil thi
november ko bharat ki bari fauj ne mashriqi pakistan par hamla kar dia

november tak mashriqi pakistan mein jangi halat bahut kharab ho gaye to sadar yahya khan ne majburan bangali rehnuma nurul amin ko aburi daur ke lia wazir azam namzad kar deye aur unke sath zulfiqar ali bhutto ko naib wazir azam aur wazir e kharja bana diya
december ko saqoot e dhaka ka saneha huwa
pakistan ke do tukrey hojaney ka nurul amin ko be inteha sadma huwa
iss moqa par unhon ne kaha kash allah tala mujhey pakistan ke iss almiya se pehley hi iss duniya se utha leta
october ko nurul amin inteqal kar gaye
pir pagara ki ibtedai zindagi mushkil halaat mein guzri
wo abhi saal ke the ke in ke walid syed sabghat ullah shah ko angrez hukomat ne hurriyat pasandi ke jurm mein giriftar kar liya

is ke bad inho ne hur jamat ko angrezon ke khilaf munazzam kiya jis par angrez hukomat ne inhe baghi qarar de kar march ko hyderabad jail mein phansi de di aur in ke jasd e khaki ko virsa ke hawale karne ke bajae ghayab kar diya
pir jo goth mein in ke aabaai ghar kangri house aur atraaf ke makanon aur aabaadi ko bombing se tabah kar diya gaya
is ke ilawa in ke mureedon ko jo hur kehlate the barhi tadad mein phansiyan di gai
us dauran pir pagara ki rohani gaddi ko hamesha ke liye khatam karne ki sazish bhi ki gai ta ke is khitte mein azaadi ka naam lene wala koi baqi na rahe
yehi wajah hai ke march se february tak kangri house mein takht pagara par koi pir muajood nahi tha

walid ki phansi ke bad sikander ali shah ko in ke chote bhai aur khandan ke deegar afraad ke sath kuch arsey bandar road ma jinnah road ke aik bungalow mein nazar band rakha gaya aur wahan se aligarh muntaqil kar diya gaya
in ki pesh goiyan aur siyasi tabsarey news papers namak mirch laga kar shaey karte the

marshal law ke khatme ke bad yeh jamhoriyat ki janib pehli peshraft thi jis se bad mein aam intekhabaat ki raah hamwar hui aur jis ke natije mein pakistan muslim league aur peoples party ki hukomatein qaiym hui thin aur mohammad khan junejo miyan mohammad nawaz sharif aur benazir bhutto ko wazarat uzma ke mansab tak pohanchne ka mauqa mila tha

october mein chohdri muhammad anwar bhander speaker maghribi pakistan ne governor maghribi pakistan nawab of kala bhag malik ameer muhammad khan ko sifarish kar ke unhen additional section judge muqarar kar deya
us commotion ne general asif nawaz jinjuwa ki muat ko fitri qarar diya jab ke bad mein ye baat sabit hoi ke unhen zahar deya gaya tha
august mein high court ne muhammad nawaz sharif ki factories seal aur par excise ka imla mutayan kar deya
is fasle ko unhon ne kaladam qarar de deya

december ko ayein ke article g ke tehat qayam muqam chief election commissioner justice mukhtar ahmed junejo ne unhen na ehel qarar dete hoye khazat e naamzadgi mustarad kar deye kyun ke un par ilzam tha ke june ko haft rozah jaridah takbeer karachi ko aik interview dete hoye fakhar un nisa judge lahore high court par badunwani ke ilzamat legaye aur nizam e adal par baat cheet karte hoye kaha ke nizam e adal ki bunyadi kharabi ye hai ken a to ise islami nizam e adal ke usolon par istawar kiya gaya aur na hi angreez ke nizam e adal ki khubiyon se arastah rehne deye gaya
ate jate hukumranon ne adliya ko apne maqasid ke leye istemal karna chaha
arzi aur juzwaqti mafadat ke leye mun zor intezamiya hamesha adalti waqar se khelti rahi
jis tarha burro curacy mein apne hawari paida keye gaye isi tarha adliya mein ye sab se bari badqismati rahi hai
phele adwar mein isi tarha hota tha ke agar judge leye gaye hain to in mein se aki adh judge aesa ajata tha jis ki hamdardiyan ya wabastagiyan hoti thein

mazi ke tajurbat bataye hain ke ye judge bhi jab masnad e adalat par beth jata tha to amomi muhall ki waja se is ki zaheni kefiyat phele jesi nahi rehti thi aur neek naami ki khatir adala o insaf se nahi khelta tha

munasib tadat mein deyanatdar bakirdar aur khuaf e khuda rakhne wale judges ki kami hamesh hi aik masla rahi hai lekin aj kal jo kuch ho raha hai i sne pore nizam e adal ki choleinholadi hain aur awam ka etemad adalaton se uthta jar aha hai

agar kisi judge ki taqaruri par woqla ki anjumanon qumi akhbaraat ke sahafiyon aur bakhbar logon ko kisi tarha ka tajub uar heart na ho to wo shkhs theek hai lekin agar kisi shakhs ke taqarur par bar association ke dafatir mein qehqaye gunjane lagein sahafi aur bakhabar log heart se aik dosre ka mun dekhne lagen hata ke aam log bhi cha magoyan karne lagein to aesa judge yaqenan mayar par pora nahi utarta aur wo munsif bane ka ehel nahi

is tarha ki taqarariyon aur intezamiya ke mafad parastana iqdat ne adliya ke idare ko shaded nuqsan phochya hai aur aaj halat ye ho chuki hai ke adalaton ke eyanon mein aesi awazein aur sazishein nazar aney lagi hain jo aam kisim ke sarkari daftaron ka khasa hoti hain
vote mustarad kar deye gaye
jin arkan ne apna haq e raidahi istamal nahi kiya in mein mulana azam tariq owees laghari raja khalid aur amanabbasi shamil han
blochistan subai assembly ke members mein se ne apna haq e raidahi istamal kiya
muhammad rafiq tarar ne nawaz sharif ki jila watni tak bara aham kardar ada kiya
is ke bad june ko general parvez musharraf ne unhen bhi sadar e pakistan ke uhde se farigh kar diya aur khud sadar e mumlikat ke uhde par faiz ho gaye
bangladesh ke founder sheikh mujeeb ur rehman ki sahabzadi apni inteqami khou par qaboo pane mien musalsal nakaam dikhai de rahi hain

miss haseena wajid ne na sirf tamam opposition jamaton ko dara dhamka kar unhe qaid o band mien rakh kar unhe election ke amal se bahar rakh kar past ke parliamentary intekhabat mien kamiyabi hasil kar li hai
wo islam pasandon bil khusoos jamaat islami ko dewaar se lagane ki policy par bhi amal peyra hain
mubsireen yeh sawal utha rahe hain ke aaya haseena wajid siyasi madbar politician hone ke bawajood siyasi mukhalfeen se is qadar khaiyf kyun hain lekin inhe is ka jawab nahi mil raha hai
december mien jamat e islami ke markazi rehnuma abdul qadir ko phansi diye jane ke bad yeh umeed ki ja rahi thi ke haseena wajid aur in ke sathiyon ka gussa qadre thanda ho chukka ho ga

lekin ab lag raha hai ke jamat e islami ke sala ameer maulana mutee ur rehman nizami samait aik darjan se zaiyd aeham siyasi karkuno ko phansi ki saza suna kar bangladesh ko danista taur par tabahi ki janib dhakela ja raha hai

abdul qadir ki phansi par bangladesh ke siyasi aur samaji halqon hatta ke zaraey iblaagh ne bhi maslehatan khamoshi ikhteyar kar rakhi thi lekin taza sazaon ke faisle ke bad zaraey iblaagh ne bhi zaban khol di hai

bengali zaraey iblaagh ne ab ki baar haseena wajid ki policy par karhi tanqeed karte hue jamaat ke sarbarah maulana mutee urrehman nizami aur in ke deegar sathiyon ko saza e maut sunae jane ki khule alfaaz mien muzammat ki hai

siyasi samaji aur iblaaghi halqon ki janib se miss haseena wajid ko yeh mashwara diya ja raha hai ke wo apna zehni muaaiyna karaey kyun ke jis qisam ki siyasi inteqami policy inho ne apna rakhi hai wo kisi bhi soorat mien mulk o qaum ke mafaad mien nahi hai
opposition ke musalsal aehtejaaj siyasi inarki aur haseena wajid ki inteqami siyasat ke natijey mien maeshiyat badtareen tabahi se do chaar hui hai
haseena wajid ke iqdamaat ke baiys gher jamhori quwwaton ko siyasat mien madakhlat ka mauqa mil sakta hai
bengali siyasat se ba khabar halqon ka khayal hai ke haseena wajid danista taur par mulk ko fauj ke hawale karne ki sazish kar rahi hain

agar inhe halaat ki nazakat ka mamooli sa bhi idraak ho to yeh andaza lar lena chahiye ke agar ab ki baar fauj ne iqtedar sambhala to haseena wajid apni zindagi ke baqiya ayyam mien siyasat ke qabil bhi nahi rahengi
unhen kamiyab karane ke leye panjab aur sindh ke wozra e aala ne do mehfooz tareen nashistein khali karaein thein aur unhen kamiyab karane ki zimedari qabol kit hi
janab shaukat azizne bhi hasbe riwayat bhohat wade waed keye intakhabi nare lagaye wahan ke awam ko kuch khawab dekhaye lekin natija wohi dhak ke teen pat
wazir e azam muntakheb hone ke bad shaukat azizsahab ne aik bar bhi us elaqe ka dorah nahi kiya

wazir e azam shaukat azizpar us waqat qatilana hamla hoa jab wo abhi wazir e azam nahi bane the yani wo aik intekhabi jalse se khitab kar ke wapis lot rahe the aur apni gari ke qareb phochne se chand lamhe phele aik zoordar damaka hoa aur wo bal bal bach gaye
ye aik khudkush hamla tha jis mein hamla awar apne maqsad mein kamiyab nahi ho saka

mumkin hai esa hi hoa ho kyun ke wazir e azam shaukat azizaksar o beshtar khzane ki tijoriyon ke bhare hoye hone ka dawa karte the lekin ese bhare hoye khazane ka kia faiedeha jo is mulik ke awam ke muan se roti ka akhari newala bhi cheen lene ke darpe ho

ho sakta ha ke wazir e azam shaukat azizki apni mali position phele se bhetar hogai ho lekin un ke dor e hukumat mein awam ki halat din badin abtar hoti chali ja rahi hai aur log khudkushiyan karne par majboor hen

september ko jab panjub assembly ne perviz musharaf ke donon uhde apne pas rakhne ke bare mein qarardad pass ki to ugle chand roz mein wazir e azam shaukat azizne waze tor par kha ke sadar ka wardi mein rehna mm ke sath kiye gaye muhaide ki khilaf warzi nahi
dosri taraf awam ki halat ye hai ke un ke mun se roti ka akhiri niwala bhi chena ja raha hai log berozgari aur bhook ke hathon khud kushi karne par majbor hain
insaf ki farhami ki sorat e haal ye hai ke koi jaiz kaam bhi rishwat ke bagher hone ka tasawor bhi khatam ho chukka hai
mulik ka khazana bhara hoa hai lakin is ke samrat awam tak nahi phonche
awam ko is bhare hoye khgazane se kiya matlab jo un se do waqat ki roti bhi chen le
sabiq wazir e azam shaukat azizke dor e hukumat mein cheeni ke bad tareen bhoran paida howa

cheeni i ki qemat rupe se bharh kar rupe tak ja phonchi wazir e azam samet hukumati aehalkar cheeni ki market mein farhami par israr karte rahe aur awam ko indiya dete rahe ke wo chini utility store se khariden
mulik mein aese stores kitne hainawam ki bhari aksariyat aam dokanon se cheeni karedne pay majboor thi aur jin elaqon mein sarkari store the bhi to awam ko waha bhi mushkilat ka samna karna para
utility stores ki chini bhi mili bhaghat se aam dokanon par farokhat hoti rahi aur logon ko mehnghe damon milti rahi aur aj tak mil rahi hai
utility stores par chini ki qemat asal qemat se derah guna ziyadah thi is baat ko hukumat danista nazar andaz karti rahi

hukumat ne sugar mil malikan ko qematein kam karne par majbor nahi kiya balke neb ne tehqiqat karana chahi to sadar perviz musharaf ke humum par ise bhi rok deya gaya kyun ke is mein ba asar hukumati ehalkar mulavis the aur wazirati kursiyon par barjaman the
un ke khilaf tehqiqat se hukumati dhanche par manfi asrat muratab hone ka andesha tha

sirf ye hi nahi kesc ptcl ki nijkari black cab tracketer zarinalit crislar aur railway coachon ke scandles ki baz ghasht bhi pore mulik mein suna di

is tarha saal mein mukamal hone wale sab se bare sanati unit ko aik ghante ki karwai mein farikhat kar deya gaya
august ko wazir e azam shaukat aziz ke khilaf tehrik e adam etimad jam karai gayi
is notice mein wazir e azam ke khilaf nukat par mushtamil charge sheet tayar ki gayi thi aur jis par opposition ke kam o besh tamam arkan ke dastakhat the
charge sheet ein kaha gaya tha ke wazir e azam pakistan steel mills ki privatization mein aain mein deye gaye mandate aur privatization ke qawanin ki khilaf warzi ke zimedar hain
is notice mein mein stock market corruption karne ke zimedar brockers ke khilaf karwai na karne ka zimedar bhi wazir e azam ko theraya gaya
chini semint gandum railway arazi scandal samit degar bezabtagiyon ki zimedari bhi wazir e azam par dal de gayi

apne khilaf tehrik e adam etemad nakam hone ke bad se le ka raj tak wazir e azam shaukat aziz gahe bagahe aur phele se ziyadah shadomad ke sath awam ko adaad o shumar ki bhol bholaiyon mein masrof rakhe hoye hain aur zarebubadla ke zakhair ki khushkhabriyan sunane ka fariza anjam de rahe hain

seth chotani ko angrezon ne apni resha dawaniyon aur sarkari aehkamat ke zariye dewaliya kar diya aur wo is sadmey se is daarfani se kooch kar gaey

inho ne liyari ke logon ko basane ke liye villages basane ka mansooba pesh kiya aur village namone ke taur par tameer karne ke liye apni janib se lakh hazar rupey ki raqam pesh ki lekin baldiya is se istefada na kar saki
angrezon ne apni makhsoos hikmat e amli ke tehat sindh ko bombay ke sath mila diya tha

amir yahya khan ki banai hui fauji adalat ne mein jahangir badar ko aik saal qaid bamushaqqat ki saza di jo bad naam zamana shahpur jail mein guzari

mein aik aur fauji adalat sajai gai aur farzand jamhoriyat ke seene par aik saal qaid aur jurmane ke tamghe lagae gae lekin aamriyat ki afriyat ko abhi tak sukoon nasib nahi hua tha

assalam o alaikum dosto kal hum ny federal or wo provinces jin mein abhi ministerial posts ki upgradation nahi hoi mein upgradation k liye protest start krnay k baray mein app logon ki opinion mangi thi kal sham sy ly kr ab tak humein jo response mila ha us k mutabiq logon ny protest start krny ka mashwara diya ha or sath mein iss protest mein shareek honay ki yaqeen dehani bhi karai ha dosto jesa k aap log jantay hein k jin provinces mein upgradation hoi ha us k peachay jaddo jehad ki aik lambi dastaan ha wo kehtay hein na k jab tak bacha roye na to maan bhi doodh nahi deti iss liye kabhi bhi koi plate mein rakh kr app ko apna haq nahi dy ga apna haq lenay k liye himmat or jazzba darkar ha jis ka izhar kpk or punjab k dosto ny kiya or kamyaabi hasil ki dosto humaray liye aap logoon ki raaye ki bohat importance ha iss liye hum aaj sy apna protest start krny ka elaan krty hein iss silsaly mein pehla protest th january at am apca pakistan railways wing k zaereehtemaam bamaqaam pakistan railways divisional superintendent office rawalpindi opposite rawalpindi railway station ho ga tamam dosto especially islamabad secretariat employees association apca baitulmal iesco employees association sy request ha k apnay haq k liye bahir niklien or iss ehtajaaj mein apni shirkat yaqeeni banaien keun k agr abb bhi hum na nikly to phir yeh mamlaa youn he latka rahay gainsha allah for more details please contact protest coordinator primeministeroffice pmpakistan mianmuhammadnawazsharif pmajk sardarabdulmajid cmsindh qaimalishah cmbalochistan sardarsanaullahzehri cmgilgitbaltistan hafizhafeezurrehman asifalizardari skhursheedshah bilawalbhuttozardari federalfinanceminister ishaqdar financeministersindh financeministerbalochistan maryamnawazsharif apca apcasindh bhurgarima islamabadcivilsecretariatemployeesassociation arynews geonews samma expressnews dunyanews wwwfacebookcompakistanfederalgovernmentclerksunion
